Summary: Very outdated rooms. Not the cleanest hotel but we came prepared with our lysol wipes to clean things down ourselves. Room was very noisy. You could hear the person walking upstirs. No hot water if waking around 8 am. I had to wake up earlier to use hot water. Nails were sticking up from the floor trim in the bathroom. We had to cover it with Band-aids to protect our family. Grab and Go breakfast was not readily available but sign say you can get certain items on the go. I asked for a bottle of water and told I had to be a member. We stayed 6 nights and was never there except to sleep. Also wanted to note how dirty the pool and jacuzzi was. The water in the jacuzzi was yellow. Just gross!!
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.   On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.   I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   If I can provide any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me directly at 9493809888.

Summary: This is by no means a 5 start property since it is a Best Western Plus but I am giving it a 5 star review. After reading all the reviews I was hesitant to stay here worried about the place being dirty and full of homeless people but that is the case. I've stayed at a lot of hotels and during my National Parks trip through Nevada, Utah, and Colorado I've stayed at a lot of Best Western Plus since they're the closest to the National Park entrances.  When we got here at check in the gentleman at the front was wearing a mask and greeted me and thanked me for being a gold member. He was very polite and friendly. Got to our room and the keys didn't work. When we headed back to the elevator a worker was coming off who just so happens to be the one to fix the doors and he promptly fixed
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wow, this hotel is either newly renovated or new. It's amazing inside and the rooms are suites with two queen beds, and another person can sleep in the front room. Wonderful bathroom, separate sink outside the bath area for getting ready two great TVs.    They have a giant dining room, where they serve the free breakfast with hot cooked eggs and bacon and hashbrowns, and everything imaginable that you could ever want for breakfast and including table side waitress first class Everything top notch I would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was great stay except was by stairs and a bit of noise during night. Everything else was great. Clean and room smelled nice.  Awesome location close to freeway.  I really enjoyed the stay  customer service was great and attendant was nice and friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Quiet, clean and would return again.
Summary: This place was clean. This place was accommodating. The free breakfast was probably our favourite part. It was delicious. I have nothing but good things to say about this place aside from not getting our room cleaned when we went on a family outing. We were gone all day and hoped we’d have clean towels and our beds made when we returned. But this place is quiet and felt safe. I’d definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your rating and compliment. We greatly appreciate your feedback! We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We have stayed at this property in the past and were very pleased.  Sadly, this stay was just OK - maybe new owners?  We were told upon arrival that the water was going to be shut off at 10am the next morning.  We had hoped to sleep in a little, but no such luck.  We understand things happen that are beyond control sometimes, but we just wished we had known this when we booked our stay.  Will we stay here again - sadly, we'll probably look elsewhere.
Manager Response: On behalf or our team, I sincerely apologize regarding water shut off. It was actually a 30 minutes check just make sure we met the city of lake forest standard. I apolgize you were not made aware of it ahead of time. We look forward towards earning back your business in the future.

Summary: I never sleep in hotels, ever.  This is the only hotel I've ever been able to sleep like a rock every night.  Beds were comfortable with multiple pillows, great heating/cooling, all amenities needed for a comfortable stay - seating room, working fridge, amble room.  Drawbacks: Sink is outside of the bathroom area - since we were staying with our adult daughter, it was difficult to bring in all of our toiletries/clothing into the bathroom to get ready without a place to put it all, small space to work in and the fan wasn't powerful enough to pull all the steam out so it wasn't the most pleasurable experience with that process (even with the little window open).  Water pressure was okay but shower head couldn't give a full body spray with power.  Breakfast was the same thing
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay, I appreciate your positive feedback regarding the room and how comfortable the beds were.  Elevator is on schedule for modernization we're just waiting for all the parts to be delivered, hopefully will be done with this project early next year.   Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary: Room was clean when we walked in. Room had 2 rooms a living room and then a bedroom and bathroom. Was nice to have your room freshened up everyday been so long since they did that. Food for breakfast was good, they had a cook, and he was cooking fresh food and he serves and plates it for you another gentlemen was helping out keeping the tables clean and things full. Parking was good and I was glat that they didn't charge for parking as so many do now a days. Friendly staff.  I did use the washer and dryer. It was a little pricy to use at $4 to wash and $4 to dry, also it was all card not coin operated. I always appreicate when hotels have the option to do laundry as i hate bringing back dirty clothes and since we mostly travel for sports i always need to keep the uniforms clean.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you as a guest. I appreciate your positive feedback. We can't wait to see you again.

Summary: How this is a Best Western plus is beyond me. Honestly, the joke was we were staying in a jail. The rooms are sad. They only have half lumpy pillows. We couldn't figure out if they cut them in half. The sheets were worn and rough. The blanket on top super thin. The windows in the back were dangerous. There is a ridiculous walkway behind the rooms which was super concerning. The sliding door had a good lock but the bathroom window which would fit a human had a really flimsy lock. Both windows lacked sealing so the air was cold. Because of those back windows on a walkway as well as the front -there was no natural light as we kept the  blinds closed. The front desk folks were nice. And the breakfast was the only thing that resembled a Best Western Plus. Good food, nice space.
Manager Response: I apologize on behalf of the team for falling short of your expectations. We'll work on the problems you stated for sure.

Summary: We visit our grandson at least once a month sometimes more. Best Western had never failed us. We always look forward to our visits. Best breakfast, the staff is always friendly and helpful. We always recommend the Lake Forest location to our family and friends.
Manager Response: I appreciate your valuable feedback. We look forward to seeing you again. thank you very much

Summary: I would definitely not stay here again. The lobby was nice and the staff was friendly. We didn't end up staying the night so I cannot comment on the breakfast. The room was dirty. The carpets were black with dirt. Stains on the furniture and blankets. The sofa bed was all springs and unusable in my opinion.The room was dimly lit and smelled musty. We decided to pack up and leave about an hour into our stay. Based on what others have said maybe we just had a bad room, but I wouldn't chance it again.
Manager Response: Hello Sarah,  Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.   I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary: There is NO way to describe the awful experience we had at this egregious Best Western which we wouldn't have checked into had we not had a very misleading phone conversation first. what they DON'T say over the phone when you take the time to call is that even if they do accept service animals they'll still charge you. once I got there they hassled me, intimidated me, disqualified me, when I'm disabled and have service animals, which obviously they were just trying to get a fee. we posted a Google review but it mysteriously disappeared an hour later. just awful. they're really good at being polite over the phone (maybe, but not lucidly honest) and when you get there their monstrous. won't mention any names but she's an older blond. they also probably lied about not having a
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Proximity to the 5 freeway was great. The room itself was great with it's separate sleeping area.  Our only issue was the firm mattress; neither of us slept well because of it. Loved the cute little balcony overlooking the pool area. Check-out took a little too long but only because the guests in front of us both had issues. Staff was friendly at both check-in and check-out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Over priced. Rude service. Plumbing backed up. Loud hum in the room 24 hrs. The lights outside turn off early at night and don’t in the early morning. If you are in the parking lot late at night or early morning, you will need a flashlight. Looks like they are trying to save money at the guests expense. Won’t be staying there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you want a good, dependable, clean place to stay with no surprises at a reasonable price. Stay here. Easy access to the highway, walking distance to a good selection of restaurants. Check in was easy, the room was clean, spacious, good pool, staff was friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very Cleaned and Organized, love the continental breakfast
Summary: Area is safe and quite  , there are lots of restaurant and coffee shops near by .staffs are very polite and friendly  perfect for family and business trip .The room is very cleaned and organized  I highly recommended!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I got away for the weekend to see family & friends because I was selling my house.  I stayed at this Best Western nearby to everything.  It was exceptional.  The front desk staff were friendly & efficient check in and check out.  The room & hotel surroundings clean.  I loved breakfast with eggs served the way you like them.  First time staying in Orange County where I could sleep all night without hearing outside noise from traffic or other hotel clients.  Definitely would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Cynthia,  Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. Summary: This hotel has had the best breakfast consistently throughout a 5 day stay.  The beds are very comfortable and the entire staff has been cheery and helpful. I would highly recommend staying at this location. Covered parking was also a plus.

Summary: My room had 2 queen beds and a separate room with sofa, desk, microwave, small fridge and another TV. Bathroom as usual but the sink is in the room. I woke up and it was hard to sleep again. I couldn´t identify from where the sound was coming....

Summary: We really enjoyed the location and the our stay and staff was attentive and friendly. Room was great! Pillows can be a bit larger. House keeping came an hour early before our check out twice. But overall everything was great.

I almost just left and moved to a different hotel, but we were tired and we had a funeral to attend the next day, we ended up staying all three days because being with family was more important than finding another hotel. Summary: Early check-in accommodated. Beautiful living area and bedroom with balcony.  Competent and friendly staff  (registration and food service) and a good breakfast. Wonderful Italian restaurant across the street. How can you go wrong? I am recommending Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel to any and everyone traveling to Orange County.

Summary: Absolutely horrendous. On the outside, the hotel looks like it hasn't been updated in decades. Sadly, the inside is just as bad. Paint chipped, dirty vents, dust under the beds, low lighting and small windows. We paid extra to book a king room with a whirlpool tub. The tub was chipped and dirty and we didn't even go in it. We questioned if the room had even been cleaned properly or just had the sheets changed. There were minimal towels and only 3 small pillows on our King bed. When we called the front desk for more pillows, they sent staff to our room with blankets instead and said "we don't have any pillows left". How does a hotel run out of pillows? It wasn't even sold out. They eventually went and "looked again" and miraculously found more small pillows. No properly sized bed

Summary: From the moment I checked in James R was SO SO PLEASANT & helpful!  The hotel is very clean.  Room was decorated cool.  I’m a BEST WESTERN Diamond Member & used part points & had a fair price for 2nd night.  Breakfast 6:00 to 9:00 weekdays.  Located by Irvine Spectrum & 5 Fwy.

Summary: Sports groups and typical teenage noise :o) everywhere; unable to access pool or hot tub.  Promised a room we never got.  "Plus" breakfast of heat-in-room microwave gray sausage, egg and cheese muffin was awful (server was nice though).

Summary: This hotel is excellent if traveling with a family, the room was large enough to accommodate 3 adults and adult sized teen an a 7 year old. The pull out bed is not the greatest but doable for a child. The breakfast was simple but enough to save us some money! The location is great! 25mins to many beaches and close to great shopping! We even got some back to school shopping done on our trip! Overall we were comfortable. This hotel is older but you can see improvement happening every day! For the price, cleanliness, space and location you can't beat it! Beds aren't the most comfortable but everything else was great.

Summary Heading: NOT CLEAN OR COMFORTABLE, spacious, good location

Summary: Upon check in front staff was rude and somewhat condescending. This did not get better, as in our bathroom there was blood smattered on the wall, and with no other available rooms we were “stuck” there.   The bathroom sink is oddly placed in the middle of the bedroom instead of the bathroom.   There were mysterious spots on the blankets in the room, but because of rude front staff felt it pointless to have said anything.   Air temperature gauge did not work well. If you prefer it cooler make sure to put several degrees cooler to get to the correct temperature.   Good water pressure.   Careful on the elevator as it made jumping sounds at times.   Breakfast consisted of coffee, cereal and bad sandwich. Had better breakfasts elsewhere (even in COVID).   Staff were even more rude at

Summary Heading: Lots of hotels in that area, stay elsewhere
Summary: Water pressure low.  Bed feels like straw.  Charge you a $75 deposit.  Loud house parties have been thrown multiple times next to me when I stayed there.  This is a fairly cheap hotel but I have learned there is a reason for it.

Summary: This some what of a hidden gem is located right off the Lake Forest exit. It is quite close by several known fast food franchises, businesses, and local restaurants. Comparatively you get more for your money's worth here, than you do at the near by hotels. By no means is it the fanciest, but what it does not possess in looks it makes up for elsewhere. For example, the spacious two divided rooms is an excellent feature, that is as a rare as it is enjoyable especially with a family. The sink fixture is both modern and elegant and gives you a feel of self importance when washing. The amenities are unfortunately limited for our safety due to COVID. However breakfast has a reasonable healthy spread with a variety of choice. Ultimately the front desk staff is what keeps this place
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed in several hotels during the pandemic in California, Nevada, and Arizona.  This was the ONLY hotel whose staff did not wear a mask during the check in process, despite the mask mandate in California.  It caused us to wonder what other basic safety mandates the hotel might be ignoring.  In addition, the facilities were unclean and aging, and the breakfast consisted only of cold cereal and yogurt, with no beverage or hot meal options at all.  We will not stay at this hotel again.

Summary: Competent and caring staff, whom goes the length to make sure your stay is satisfactory. Rooms are spacious, sanitized, and safe. Last, but not least the value is quite affordable if comparing the relative rate to what you get elsewhere. Best bang for your buck, hands down :)

Summary: Needed a pet friendly hotel, pictures looked nice, so used my rewards points to try this location. The room was comfortable, bed decent, linens where above average, A/C worked well. Pictures were correct but a bit embellished as this had more of a motel than hotel feel. Unfortunately for me, check in was horribly late, cable was out for many hours, and parking was a real problem by 8pm. No solutions from front desk except wait it out and park across the street at another business. Lots of hotels on the same street and I suggest you check other options before settling on this one.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best place to stay, employees  Rene flores,Michelle ramirez and Salina are polite and courteous I stay here a lot because of them they always make sure I'm taking care of. Great customer service goes a long way
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: improve the supervision of the rooms
Summary: I liked the room and the design well, but the maintenance department has to agree with the housekeeping department, the sink faucet was loose, the water outlet was blocked, the bathroom was not clean properly, the toilet had  Remains of a magic eraser, the bathtub had pieces of soap and the shower head too .... Otherwise all good, I hope they improve the supervision of the rooms and more in these times of pandemic.  Thank you so much
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is undegoing revovation so not much can be said about the appearance. Breakfast was cancelled due to Covid 19 sutuation, which is understanable. But otherwise, great value! Close to everything, proffesional staffs, and very cery clean room. Oh! and oversize bathtub! Highly recomended.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall the room was great to be in. Traveling alone at a young age I felt very safe here. The room def could have been cleaned better upon check in (beer bottle cap & toothpaste on counter) however on a daily basis housekeeping was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is a nice, all suites hotel. I have been staying at least twice a week these last 6 weeks. Clean, close to 5 Fwy and, many services. It is a little dated on the room decor but everything was clean and easy to access. This is a 3 1/2 star place but the staff makes it a 4 star. Amanda on the graveyard shift and Michelle on days are the best. They are what made me come back again and again. Thank you ladies for all your effort.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I checked in on 06/19/2020. Walked in our room, smelled horrible, unsanitary, smelled like dog pee, dirty, etc....checked out the next day. My husband said we were charged $30 from this horrible hotel because, first the lady said it was a pet fee(which we DID NOT HAVE ANY PET) then she said the “blow dryer” was missing! What kind of hotel is this! First of all, we never mentioned about us having a pet but we were put in a room for people has pets. Second, why the hell would I take their freakin hair dryer! I don’t even use hair dryers from any hotels we’ve checked in! This place is horrible! Peace of advice, if something is missing, call the person and ask before charging them without knowing what they are being charged for. Your hotel is not all that so a little
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is nice except the breakfast ,I was expecting we can have hot meal but I guess we came at the wrong time because of pandemic but they should do better than just orange and muffin.Plus the pool was closed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Arrived Tired and Irritable from a 6-hour drive from Arizona.  The two desk clerks (sorry ladies I lost the biz card with your names on it)  were so pleasant my mood changed quickly.  After a quick check-in i was in my room, in bed with a drink- exactly where i needed to be
Manager Response: none

Summary: No problem checking in and to my surprise it was fast and the customer service is great. I would recommend this hotel to family and friends. The breakfast was nice and full, the workers there were courteous and helped me out with a little problem 10pm at night. Parking was okay, not worried at all about parking because its in a garage. The rooms however was NICE!! I loved that we stayed in a room with a balcony and had a nice view. Thank you for such a memorable stay and I loved how its convenient with the gas station and many resturants near by. Thank you again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was friendly. The room could have been a little closer to the elevator but, the comfort and roominess of the accommodations made up for the walk.  The breakfast was better than what you can get in a restaurant and it was included in the cost of the stay.  I'll be back. Thanks
Manager Response: none

Summary: I called ahead to make sure I didn’t have to walk far as my hip was broken. I check in to find out the elevator by the handicap parking is broken and I need to walk to the back of the hotel and then to the end of that floor to get to my room. You could not find a room farther away from the handicap parking than my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. We experience technical difficulties with our main elevator during your stay, the elevator company tried to get the elevator up and running as soon as they could. We hope this does not deter you from staying with us in the future.  Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary: For such a small and kinda hidden location. Rooms were very clean and spacious. Unfortunately the location and hotel name is decieving.  Hotel is actually 3 exit's south of 5S from the Irvine spectrum. If the breakfast isn't satisfying, next exit you got FarmerBoys, Canes, Denny's and Bagel shack. Pool and jacuzzi are handycap friendly but small for groups or families. Bed's are very comfortable and  very convenient for quick visits in town.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is in a good location, is clean, has a great pool area and offers hot and cold breakfast selections.  We had a suite room that opened into a living area with a sofa bed and a separate room with two queen beds.  The room was clean but dated with a bit of a stale odor.  We turned the fan on to move the air around and it helped.  The biggest drawback was having the bathroom sink/mirror in the sleeping area, not in the bathroom with the toilet and shower.  If someone gets up to use the bathroom during the night, everyone hears the sink running to wash hands and if you wake up early, it's not possible to get ready while others are sleeping. Good hotel, could just use an update.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Best a western had a  super easy check in and check out process. Every morning, they serve a delicious, hot breakfast which includes eggs, hash browns, sausage links, and bacon. The rooms are clean and they had fast internet. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an excellent stay here. Everything was clean and well kept bothering in the rooms, breakfast area and lobby. The grounds are well kept and you feel very safe.  The staff was amazing and helpful with all our needs. The front desk staff were amazing with all their helpful tips and willingness to accommodate our families needs. The greeted us every morning and evening with a smile and how are you.  The breakfast was also great and had a wonderful selection to accommodate any diet needs. The staff and cook were super friendly and helpful, too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If your in the area you owe it to yourself to try out this hotel.  From the time we arrived to the end of our stay the staff was very attentive and friendly.  Large rooms (suites), great breakfast and exercise room.  We stay there at least 4-6 times a year and look forward to each one.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place was very accommodating. There was a high school band just checked in and i hardly knew they were there. The breakfast was great as well. I think the nicest thing was after my first night i heard the airconditioner above my room so they offered to change myroom
Manager Response: none

Summary: You cannot see this hotel unless you are know it is there, which makes for a pleasant hide away. Not alot of traffic on the street, noise level is low. Best of all, shoping center is close by 5 min walk of 2 min drive.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, excellent price! We had a 2 room suite for under $100, well worth it! They are friendly and very accommodating. The gentleman making breakfast made my husband fried eggs specially for hi. Great location, close to coast and inland locations.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You cannot go wrong with stayig at a Best Western
Summary: This particular hotel was probably fabulous in its day.  We would have preferred the sink to be located in the bathroom rather than the sleeping area.  It was nice to have two separate rooms- sleeping and lounging. It was certainly a value for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the 3rd year we have stayed here for our DSU Oceanography Field Course. Manager Rene Flores worked with us for our dates, rates, and even special exception for an early Saturday breakfast. The entire hotel staff is helpful and friendly. They have the most excellent hot breakfast: eggs, sausage, bacon, hash browns all cooked right on the grill. Plus their waffle-maker is the best I've had. The location is perfect for access to Laguna Beach, Dana Point, and Newport Beach -- all less than 20 minutes away. HIGHLY RECOMMEND anytime you are in the area!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed two nights for a softball showcase at Huntington and fountain Valley.  Decent rooms and great breakfast. Pretty nice location and some of the team walked to buffalo wild wings for dinner. Outdoor pool was fun for the girls.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Expensive area but a nice hotel with reasonable pricing most of the time
Summary: I stay here when I teach in Mission Viejo because of the nice accommodations, the hot tube and pool, and the excellent breakfast.  I am also usually able to plug in my Volt car though only to 110 volts.  The rooms are up to date and the bed and pillows very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Needed to have a block of rooms for a wedding that was in the vicinity. I was put in contact with Rene Flores. From day one, he was very helpful, patient and professional. He listened to my questions and provided me with the best options. He and his staff made my and my family’s stay wonderful. Thanks to Mr. Flores and his wonderful staff! Would definitely recommend this hotel. It’s clean, has free breakfast and a wonderful staff! Coletta Wedding
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay was very good, the rooms are great love the sitting area, the breakfast food could have been better.  It was very clean.  The only other complaint would be the hot tub was not working and I was really looking forward to that.  But I will stay here again
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for two nights on business/leisure. The staff was very friendly and professional. The check in and check out process was quick and easy. The breakfast service was excellent as well. I highly recommend this property if you're ever in this part of town and in need of a hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spent the weekend while riding the Pacific Coast 100. Several miles from the start but easy off the freeway and good eating options close by.  Garage parking  a plus, nice breakfast, and the rooms were quiet despite the roar of the freeway
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was very nice and spacious with a balcony. 1 thing that was a little weird was the restroom sink was next to the TV in the bedroom but it was easy to get over. 2 TVs a couch,  desk and chair. Nice size closet space. Room was also equipped with mini fridge and microwave which is always a plus. Nice sports bar across the street and tons of fast food around the corner. Will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nightmare! We were at this location years ago and were ecstatic of the whole experience. This time around, we were very much disappointed. everything has changed from the room smell, poor amenities, roaches etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary: Overall the place has gone through a remodel. The rooms are updated, however the bathroom (shower and tub) are still antiquated.  Breakfast - continental, it won't be a Denny's but if you want a quick bite to hold you over till lunch; it will work.  Lobby is modern and nice to relax on cofy chairs.  There's a loft on top of the breakfast area - nice and quiet, large out door chairs with shade, over looking the pool.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I've ever stayed in.
Summary: A group of teenage softball players were in the hotel. They were at the pool  in the evening  loud and out of control. Due to the configuration of the hotel the noise echoed throughout. . Parents or chaperones were non existent. We complained to the front desk on numerous occasions, only to be told, "we've asked to quiet down but that's all we can do". There were no secuity guards. We threatend to call the police and they said Oh well ok do  what you have to do.  Breakfast was just ok. They offered fried eggs one day and did not offer them on the other days of our stay. No bananas.  Rooms are tired. Elevators dirty. When we checked out the clerk didn't even ask how our stay was? That's standard proceduer in ever hotel I;ve ever stayed in.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I apologize about the excessive noise you experience, this will be addressed to the corresponding party.

Summary: This hotel is outdated and not very well kept. The bedsheets were stained. There was a musty smell in the room. The deadbolt didn't work. And the huge gap under the door let bugs walk right in.  I won't be staying here together.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary Heading: Construction going on next door. Putting a building up.
Summary: I should have been told over the phone that the "only" hot tub rooms faced the construction site. I would have tossed the hot tub. I thought I paid for a King bed and had a Queen size bed ?  The mattress was very comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel in safe area. Clean rooms, comfy beds, delicious hot breakfast with scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, waffles, oatmeal bar, cereal, yogurts, fruit. Plenty of room to find a place to sit. Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was horrible, sink on the room next to the TV instead of being at the bathroom, smelly rooms, like an old hotel, all the isles to go to your room is made out of concrete. SERVICE HOWEVER IT WAS GREAT!!!.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary: The hotel was very clean. The WiFi could be a little faster with better signal coverage throughout the property, but was adequate. The breakfast was wonderful and the gym was very nice too. The location was conveniently located close to the freeway. I would definitely return if I'm ever in the area again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for one night on business in late May 2019. For the price, the hotel was okay, but considering the age of the hotel, it must get a lot of use because it already feels run down and tired.   The lobby is dark, the rooms are dark and depressing, the hallways are open air but still dark. To be fair, there is good lighting in the front portion of the rooms (sitting area) but the lighting and natural light in the sleeping room/bathroom area is poor at best and I felt like I was in a dungeon.  The towels were nice sized for a small 12-year old child but tiny for an adult of just about any size. Furthermore, the towels felt as though they had been washed 1 million times. The bed linens were grey from overwashing, were stiff and uncomfortable. The bed itself was not very
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary Heading: A one week stay that more than met our needs!
Summary: In May 2019 we took a family trip to California on short notice and needed to stay somewhere in the vicinity of Aliso Viejo.  After searching hotels in that area we chose to stay at the Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum in Lake Forest as it seemed to meet all our needs.   My wife and I spent seven nights there while our son spent three nights and our daughter stayed for two nights and we all enjoyed our stay.   This hotel is located very close to Highway 5 wihich makes it very convenient for driving to John Wayne Airport, Irvine, Anaheim, or even San Diego as well as attractions in Orange County.  It is also a short walk from several restaurants and a short drive from many more restaurants and a supermarket.  All the rooms in this hotel are suites, with the bedroom in the back
Manager Response: none

Summary: I loved the room I got. It was suite so it was perfect and so much room! We got there after 830pm and were treated with a smile and fast. We were tired. Breakfast was AMAZING the staff in the dinning room was so interactive and they were so helpful. The stay was amazing!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Especially Selena and Michelle they go above and beyond for their guest to make you feel comfortable and at home! Good job Best Western Plus for finding these great employees! Keep up the great work Selena!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here with my boyfriend for 1 night in the King Whirlpool suite. Upon checking in we actually received the King corner whirlpool suite without the extra charge, which I absolutely loved and would probably want to get again. The exterior of the hotel appeared very shabby looking which had us second guessing our choice. There is a very nice looking Holiday Inn down the street. However, once settled in the front desk staff was very friendly, everything was clean, breakfast was good. Location was great, close enough to the freeway entrance. Variety of places to eat all around. Some construction going on in the lot next door which woke us up earlier in the morning. All in all I would definitely stay here again for the same experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Needed a last minute room and the Staff was pleasant and accommodating to my request. Room was nice and clean and location was great. Quiet area Breakfast was offered and it was great. will stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: My Stay at Best Western Lake Forest
Summary: Whenever we visit South Orange county, we like to be at a comfortable location that has access to the areas we are visiting.  This Best Western fits the bill every time.  We have stayed at several other locations in the area, this is great for our needs.  If we need to go to John Wayne airport it is about a 15 minute ride.  The shopping, churches, restaurants and other places we attend are nearby as well.  Always clean, staff is very good, and always helpful!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is not well maintained, obviously putting nothing into long term maintenance and upkeep. This is an "old time" motel, even though it is multi-story. Should be considered with the very low end hotels/motels. I couldn't get out of there fast enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.

Summary: This hotel is very nice. Rooms were clean and spacious. Liked having the extra living area separate from the bedroom. The bathtub was large however, the shower head could have been better. Seemed like it needed to be replaced as the spray was all wonky. The beds were comfortable but the pillows were a little lumpy. The hotel was quiet and I enjoyed the free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate you letting us know that you had some issues with the shower head. We are sorry for this issue, but are happy to read that you enjoyed the complimentary hot breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great, reasonably priced hotel in an expensive area
Summary: I've stayed here before and will stay here again.  Plenty of parking, nice lobby, tasty breakfast cooked in front of you, staff helpful and courteous.  Far enough from the highway for relative quiet which is important to me with my afternoon naps.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you  found the accommodations pleasant, clean, and the staff was attentive and nice.  Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: A perfect hotel in a reasonably quite area off the major highway which is what I wanted after having business meetings all day.  The best part was the hot breakfast that you don’t even get at a 4 star hotel.  Any included in the price of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. We are glad that you enjoyed the complimentary hot breakfast and found the location convenient for your business meetings. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Having to work through the Holidays, staff members are pleasant, professional, and diligent. Through no fault of their own on a minor problem, Front Office acknowledged and profusely apologized on the issue that had inconvenienced them more than us.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I'm sorry to hear that you experienced a minor problem, but I am please to know that the staff apologized and resolved the issue. We would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Bucks Vacation  The stay was enjoyable and it's located across the street from Sammy's Original Sports Bar.  Plenty of TV's for all sports and Off Track Betting is a bonus for someone like me that enjoys the ponies.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are happy to hear that you found your stay enjoyable. We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary: This Best Western was extremely clean and quiet. We arrived and we're upgraded so our room had a jacuzzi tub and an additional bedroom upstairs. Breakfast was really good. They served scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon, hashbrowns and they had the usual oatmeal, cereal, toast and yogurt. It was nice that breakfast was served until 10 a.m. The front desk were very cordial and the hotel is extremely quiet.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to post a review of your stay. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your upgraded room and the complimentary hot breakfast buffet. The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: We enjoyed the stay.  We had a room on the 4th floor.  It was a suite, so had a sofa bed in the front room.  We liked it because we didn't have to sit on the bed to watch TV.  We could have, as there were two TVs.  We liked being able to sit in the chair or the couch.  The door between the room was able to be closed for sound reduction.  The bed was comfortable and we didn't toss and turn as in some hotels.  The breakfast was very good and the hot items were cooked continuously while we were there.  Plenty to choose from and fresh fruit was available.  We didn't go in the jacuzzi or pool, but they were available.  Also there is an exercise room, but were there only for a short time so didn't see it. The room AC/heater unit can be controlled for white noise sound machine running
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. It is nice to know that you enjoyed your stay and all the amenities that we offer. We look forward to hosting you again should your travels bring you back into the area.

Summary: Room was pretty big and clean,plus the breakfast was so tasty. This hotel is so close to everything, so many restaurants near it and a mcdonalds just around the corner. Really enjoyed my 2 nights here, will be back for sures.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary: This hotel is highly recommended. We stayed there and it was clean, staff was great and the breakfast even better. Eggs made fresh and not laying in a tray after being warmed up. Nice fresh hash-browns as well. Stay here if going to the Irvine area. Comfortable beds  and ample parking.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We truly appreciate your kind words and we are glad that you enjoyed the breakfast and that you found our rooms to be clean and the staff friendly. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: I stayed three nights at this hotel recently. The room I stayed in was nice and clean. It was a one bedroom suite, that had a small balcony. The room was very comfortable and had pretty much everything I needed, though a full length mirror would have been helpful. The breakfast was very good, with most everything you might want to have in the morning. The staff were very nice, helpful, and professional. I've stayed at a number of Best Western Plus hotels, and this one was definitely the best.
Manager Response: The staff and I would like to thank you for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate your kind words regarding the hotel and the staff. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Although this property is sort of hidden behind some office buildings right off the freeway, it's a good little property with great staff, great big rooms and full breakfast. They give you water bottles upon checking in AND checking out! The pool, although not heated, is large enough as is the spa. The housekeeping staff is very efficient. Great value!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed our large suites, friendly staff, and complimentary breakfast. We truly appreciate your comments and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel is a random area. Seems like there's plenty of parking. Two room suite is nice. Building itself seems outdated and could use some work here and there. Mini fridge had no temp dial so it took forever for beverages to get cold. Two tvs is a nice deal but the remotes are laggy. The tv service sucks and constantly lags and restarts. Bathroom set up is odd. Don't like the idea of the sink being right next to the bedroom TV. Whoever did the house keeping in my room did not replace the used bottles of shampoo and conditioner. There were also some spiderwebs. Curtains are so old and worn. Need to be replaced. So glad they have central air. I hate those inefficient wall units. My room is cool and comfortable. One thing I noticed was annoying is that the rooms aren't very sound
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your stay at our hotel. We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I'm disappointed to hear that you had issues with the refrigerator and that your amenities were not replaced when empty.  I am sharing your comments with the staff to make sure your experience is not repeated. Our team is committed to satisfying our guests, so we are very thankful for your feedback. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Comfortable suite accommodations with better than average breakfast.  The spa whirlpool is well maintained, and the swimming pool was perfect for a slow breaststroke. Good comfort to cost ratio. Tucked away between two I-5 exits in the heart of Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am glad to see that you were pleased with the accommodations and the complimentary breakfast.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Good value.  Good location.  Helpful staff. Just what I needed for my business trip.  Suite was nice and roomy to work in.  Easy access to freeways. I would recommend. Looks like more is going in close by - should make it even better.  (I almost never give 5s)
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you found the accommodations pleasant, clean, and the staff was attentive and helpful.  Thank you again for your review and recommendation.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: i try to stay at best westerns when i travel since i am a rewards member. this hotel was close to restaurants and some stores within walking distance. also close to freeway but far enough not to hear noise. stayed here to attend a concert at five points arena. it was a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. It's great to hear that you found the accommodations conveniently located to restaurants and the Five Points Amphitheater. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: I have been a BW Platinum/Diamond member for over ten years. This by far was the worst experience staying at a BW Hotel ever!! When we arrived, during a very hot spell, we found the A/C was off in the room. It was not until almost Mid-night (4 hours) before the room was cool enough to sleep. In using the bathroom, we found water dripping from the ceiling (we were on the third floor). Called the front desk and was told they would send up a maintenance person to check things out. One never showed. Called the front desk and the person there (Chidair) said the person went to the floor above us and said the water was from a dripping shower. After further conversation, I was told they did not have an evening maintenance person. I was then told by Michelle the water was from a dripping
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that you experienced so many issues while staying with us.  As this hotel’s manager, I can assure you that I have reviewed your comments with the staff and made sure that they understand that the A/C unit in the suite you were staying in was designed to drain the condensation from your unit into the shower to prevent leaks in the ceiling.  As for the incident with the towels, I am completely speechless regarding this behavior and will address this as well, I usually receive comments on how helpful and friendly my staff is as you can see by other reviews.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: The hotel had a nice pool and an excellent breakfast. Rooms were spacious. I personally do not like having the wash basin next to the beds,- I like to wash in private. The sofa turned into an extra bed but was very uncomfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Construction noise in progress daily on both sides of this hotel and 24/7 noise from the 5 freeway - Good choice ? NOT !
Summary: This was my first stay here and will be my last. Hotel management has an obligation to inform guests of any construction in progress, otherwise they are misleading guests while withholding information until it is too late to cancel your reservation without paying for some portion of the reservation. In addition, with the large rooms, the hotel appeared popular with large groups / families; resulting in overcrowding the undersized pool (safety may be an issue here since there was apparently no lifeguard on duty). The breakfast room was also overcrowded. I rank the breakfast as average if you tolerate reconstituted eggs. The overall concern with Best Western hotels is the lack of consistency across those that I have experienced.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay.  The situation you described regarding the construction in the surrounding lots is truly regrettable. Unfortunately, we have no control on what the property owners of the surrounding lots choose to do with their property. We are only allowed to complain to the city if the construction noise starts before 7:30am and does not stop until after 7pm. Due to the time of year that you were staying with us, we did have several sports groups that were staying and they can create a challenge for our breakfast and pool areas. We try to provide the groups with staggered breakfast times and will leave the breakfast open longer to accommodate any of our other guests. We offer overflow seating in our lobby area and are happy to provide trays so you make take it back to your suite.  We are very sorry for your experience. Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in town.

Summary: We always try to stay with Best Western when we can.  Our focus of this stay was Laguna beach.  We spent a day at the Art Festival and attended the wonderful Pagent of the Masters performace....a must see if you've never experienced it.  Despite the fact that our stay coincided with a HUGE girls softball tournament and several teams were staying at the hotel, we had a pleasant stay.  Our room had a spare seating area which helped keep the pool noise to a minimum.  We had requested early check in and the front desk staff was very accommodating in getting us in early...thank you!  The breakfast has a wide variety of choices including freshly cooked eggs, bacon and has browns.  I want to give the cook KUDOS for not only keeping up with the demand but for also preparing a "to go"
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is located just off the I-5 Freeway but you can't hear the freeway noise.  Two youth teams were also staying at the hotel during our overnight stay.  While you could hear the kids having fun while outside, once inside our room, we couldn't hear them (and all rooms are 'right off the pool area' where the kids were playing).  Pleasant surprise!    Fridge didn't work in room, even after someone came up to 'fix it' for us, but overall it was a very nice stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: IRVINE, SPECTRUM SHOPPING, and LAGUNA BEACH
Summary: We had plans to go to Laguna Beach for the Arts Festival and Pagent of the Masters and enjoy a day at the beach as well as meeting family living in “The OC” area so we selected this hotel which was ideal to meet all of these needs. We were met by friendly staff and a free upgrade to a wonderful suite with jacuzzi tub. A nice breakfast provided and the pool were other amenities we enjoyed. A great location for freeways, airport, shopping, and the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I am happy to hear that our location met your traveling needs and that our team was friendly and helpful with you during your stay. Thank you again for your kind words. The staff and I would love to provide you with another relaxing stay in the future.

Summary: We stayed here as an entire lacrosse team of families for a tournament.  The facility was great.  Location is close to Great Park Sports Complex.  They were very helpful to find us conference room space for team events and meals.  Rooms were clean and up to date.  Pool was clean and not crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting such a positive review of my staff. I truly appreciate your comments regarding the the location and that the amenities we offer suited your needs. Thank you again for sharing your comments with us. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: Large room, pet friendly and comfortable. Had a patio out the back for fresh air. Nice selection for breakfast. Fairly standard room but a good value for the area. There is a lot of light around the pool area which can be distracting but closing the slider door between rooms helped.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. It is nice to hear that you found our suites to be large and comfortable for you and your pet. The staff and I appreciate your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary: This hotel is close to UCI. Stay there for my daughter’s graduation. We had a roomy suite. Checked in late with no problems. Breakfast in the morning had a large variety. Easy on and off the freeway, but no freeway noise.
Manager Response: Congratulations to your daughter on her commencement! We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us and we look forward to seeing you again the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: It was good - a solid 3, just nothing that wowed me enough to push it to a 4. I’d stay here again if I got a good deal. There are 2 other hotels within a block - I would probably price check them, too before booking.    The good: I love the suite configuration of the rooms - a “living room” plus having the sinks outside of the bathroom makes family travel much more pleasant. Many rooms on the third-floor and higher had a very nice balconies, too.  The breakfast is similar to other best westerns, but the hot eggs & meats were served by the cook from behind a sneeze guard - no grubby kid hands in the bacon! There is ample free parking, much of it covered, and the location of the hotel is wonderful - near many stores, restaurants, and the freeway.  The OK: front desk was polite and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We appreciate your feedback and I look forward to sharing it with the staff. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: The room was nice, except the fire alarms went off becouse we took a shower!!!!! Wh itch is absolutely Ridiculous!!!!!!!  Also there was the large group of children running around like wild animals threw the hallways yelling and screaming most of the day and early in the morning unattended! You aren’t allowed to VAPE in the rooms, but you can let your kids run around the hotel and lobby like wild animals! There are no signs warning parents and requiring them to be responsible for their offspring even when being disrespectful and disrupting the peace. Not a completely happy stay! And forget breakfast! Thanks kids for grossing me out and turning my breakfast by sneezing on the food and touching most of it with their bare hands! Yuck yuck yuck!!!!!! 🤯🤢🤮🤢🤯
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I'm sorry to hear that you did not have a good experience due to the sports teams that were here during your stay. We try very hard to ensure all our guests have a pleasant experience while staying with us. We will be more attentive to the activities that are going on at the hotel and enforce quite hours after 10pm. We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to to provide you with a better experience with us.

Summary: Stayed there for business company paid for the room. But would stay here when I'm back in the area. Easy access from the freeway. Great complementary amenities: Free HOT BREAKFAST (yes really hot cooked on a griddle), free WIFI, and parking. Will recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: I appreciate you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you found the accommodations conveniently located to the freeway and that you enjoyed the complimentary hot breakfast buffet.  Thank you again for your review and recommendation.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located off the highway which made my commute easy. The breakfast, WIFI and free parking is a PLUS. Will be returning to this location in the near future. The hotel is fairly price for the amenities that are included with your stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. It is wonderful to hear that you had a great stay with us and that you enjoyed all the amenities that are offered. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Had used this hotel for my wedding party for our Laguna wedding, not very impressed with the room or the management, the only person that was on top of things that were wrong was the evening front desk guy.  I don’t believe we will stay here again for future visits to the Laguna area
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.I'm truly am sorry that you had such a poor experience during your wedding. We always strive to provide our guest with a pleasant stay. I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: My wife and I visited from out of state for a long weekend to attend a relative's wedding.  The suite was spacious, the breakfast better than at many "breakfast included" places (it was a meal not continental), and the value was very good.  Would have graded value as a "5" if it had been a category for ranking.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I am glad to read that you found the accommodations spacious and that you enjoyed the complimentary hot breakfast buffet. Thank you for choosing Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very nice suite, loved the separation from the living room to the beds, TVs in both rooms, clean room, great maid service, nice pool and spa, great breakfast, waffles, eggs, hash browns, toast, muffins, pastry, would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. It is wonderful to hear that you had a pleasant with us and that you enjoyed the spacious suite and breakfast. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Very Good hotel, near restaurants and grocery stores. Good variety at breakfast. Suites were good for business travel. Only complaint was that the Hot tub was dirty-foamy and had a strange odor. Overall though it is a convenient hotel for business travel due to proximity to Irvine.
Manager Response: I appreciate you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. I'm sorry to hear that there was an issue with the hot tub, I will speak with our pool service provider to see if we can prevent this from happening in the future. It's great to hear that you found the accommodations conveniently located to the freeway and that you enjoyed the complimentary hot breakfast buffet. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: I have thought long and hard about this review, but I believe people should know what this hotel is all about.  So, starting the day of check-in, we arrived at the hotel to find that we had no rooms and the place was sold out except for one room.  The guy at the front desk, evening shift worker, was phenomenal, he gave us the one room they had which we were able to get our family of 7 into.  We got into our room that night, which was a beautiful room except for the air conditioning drain above your head in the shower that drops freezing cold water on your head while you shower and the ants that were all over the counters. The room is equipped with a loft area which helped us with the large family.  I have to say that staff there is AMAZING they do go above and beyond in a hard
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize again for not being able to locate the reservations you made online with the group link that was provided for your wedding party. I would really appreciate if you would please contact me and provide me with the confirmation numbers, so that I can have our online reservations team look into this matter so we may prevent it from happening again.  I understand how frustrating it must have been for you upon your arrival not to have a reservation, but I am glad that my staff was able to find accommodations for you that evening, and that we were able to provide you with an additional room the following day. I would also like to apologize that you had ants in the room, we would have gladly relocated you or had the room treated if it would have been brought to our attention. I truly am sorry that you had such a poor experience during your wedding. We always strive to provide our guest with a pleasant stay.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: A very nice hotel to use during your travel by yourself or with family.Service was great and you get a free full breakfast not a continental breakfast. There is also a shopping mall nearby. The street leading to the hotel is a little tricky, it's a turn off that you might pass by.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We are glad to hear the you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet and that the staff was helpful. We hope to see you again soon the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Our stay was a disaster and a lot of work on top of keeping long hours. The sofa bed mattress was covered in plastic, the sheets were damp, and the bed itself was broken . I called for fresh bedding and slept on the folded sofa. (The 2 queen beds were being used by other family members.)  Our room was across from a housekeeping room and I had to get up at 11:30PM at night to ask the maintenance guy to be quiet because my baby and I couldn’t sleep from all the banging around. Why would they schedule loud work while guests are sleeping?  The floors of the upstairs lobby were wet and incredibly slippery. Sure, there were wet floor signs, but it was concerning to navigate and difficult to walk on. Why not just lay down rugs to keep your guests safe?  We skipped breakfast on Saturday
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations and for the frustration you experienced during your stay. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us over the phone and in your review to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: The location and price are great for a Suite Room. Room was nice and clean. All the staff was helpful during my stay. Breakfast was enjoyable. Location is near Irvine Spectrum Center and Outlets for shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. It is wonderful to hear that you had a great stay with us and that you enjoyed the spacious suite and breakfast. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: This is an older property , while well maintained it is in need of renovation. The rooms are noisy especially if you are next to a room with a jacuzzi.   The location is great and while the rates create value it’s really about trade offs.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. It's great to hear that the staff was helpful during your stay. I appreciate your feedback regarding the rooms and the issue of noise, we will take that into consideration upon our renovation. Thank you for choosing the Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Checked in to an old style motel.  It had seen better days.  The staff was friendly.  The room was on the fourth floor.  A very slow elevator guided you there.  Walked along an outside hallway to a battered door, and opened it.  I could have been Don Johnson filming an episode of Miami Vice back in the day.  The room was clean and well appointed with a one night stay of provisions.  The bed was old school and uncomfortable, but it was appointed with a lot of pillows.  In the morning, the water took a bit to get hot, but in the end, it was.  All good.  I checked out easily then popped in to check out the breakfast.  It was like any other except for the guy behind the counter serving it to you on a plate.  Overall not too bad for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It was fine, skip the breakfast
Summary: The room was nice, and clean.  So, we were 85% there as far as I'm concerned.  Outside the room, there was no charm or ambiance, which sometimes you don't need but is always welcome.  It is a motel and it just can't lose that motel feel once you are outside, but it is in suburban California, so it felt safe and warm. The lobby and the breakfast room lacked personality  And accept the wonderful guy who greeted us when we first arrived, the staff never spoke to us or greeted us unless we approached them with our quick question.  It was like a timeshare in that I felt like we were on our own, but no one was in our hair either.  The breakfast was not worth the price of "free" and I've a low standard for "free".  Otherwise there was nothing wrong with the hotel.  We only wanted a
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I apologize that your stay was less than enjoyable.  We strive to provide our guests with a comfortable, friendly experience. So, I am disappointed to hear that my staff was not attentive during your stay and that you disliked the breakfast options. Unfortunately, the surrounding lots are privately owned and we have no control as to how they are kept. As for my staff, we will take your comments and address them with the staff so to provide a better experience for future guests. We hope you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you are in the area.

Summary: What a great decision it was to stay here! During my 4 day 3 night stay, I was always greeted with a hello and a smile from all staff. The room was very clean and spacious. Every morning I had a great breakfast provided by the hotel staff. My room was put together while I was away during the day perfectly. I would highly recommend this hotel for your next stay!
Manager Response: The staff and I would like to thank you for writing such amiable things about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your comments regarding the clean accommodations, great breakfast, and friendly staff. Thank you again for your kind words. The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Reasonable and comfortable but several problems
Summary: We have stayed here quite a bit recently due to its convenience to a family member. Generally, it is comfortable and the price is reasonable. The breakfast is quite average. My main problem is the number of problems we encountered. Once the message light on the phones was blinking although there was no message (called but was not resolved). Our last stay came with a slew of problems. Off and on blinking light in sink area (did not report until we left). One television not working (reported and resolved). Outlet for dryer not working (called and resolved). The topper however was one of the days we were there we came back to find the towels gone (ok because used) but NO towels to replace them. Called front desk twice before received some towels (only the three large ones).
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize that there were several issues with your guest room and that it took several requests to receive additional towels.  To prevent this from happening again, my team is going into all the guest rooms to verify that all items are in proper working order and will follow-up with all guest delivery requests to confirm they have been done.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Great experience every time i stay here. Nice rooms , especially the suites. they even have a couple with whirlpools. Quiet hotel with nice, comfortable bed. I have no complaints and will stay here again next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I am glad to read that you had a great experience during your stay with the suite and that the staff was friendly. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Excellent BW Hotel.  One of the best!  All good.  No complaints.   Check-in & check-out is quick and friendly. Service is all smiles and friendly. Food items were excellent w/a chef included. All quality hotel.  Do yourself a favor and stay at this hotel!!
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and the staff was attentive and friendly.  Thank you again for your review and recommendation.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: This hotel is very warm and the staff personable.  Relaxing place to stay. Rooms and beds were comfortable.  Breakfast was a full breakfast which was great. Even an attendant at breakfast. I always stay here when in area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property. It is great to hear that you had an excellent stay with us and really enjoyed the breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: The rooms were Clean, The Staff was very Helpful, in fact they were a pleasure to deal with. We felt that the rates were very fair. Highly Appreciate. Would recommend staying here, I know that 6we will be back next year.
Manager Response: The team and I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. It's great to hear that the staff was friendly and helpful during your stay. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to seeing you again next year and repeating your experience with us.

Summary: The older out of date hotel and room had everything that mattered to us: Cleanliness, comfortable beds, quiet, spacious, great shower, free safe parking and a wonderful fresh home made breakfast cooked in front of you. No pre-made, frozen or imitation food. Fresh eggs, hashbrowns, turkey bacon and sausage served to you in a real plate (not paper) by the chef. Nothing fancy,  just comfort!!
Manager Response: I would like thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. I'm so pleased to hear that we provided the accommodations that met your needs, and that you felt safe and comfortable throughout your stay. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights over the Thanksgiving weekend. We were pleased to see that the sofa bed could be separated from the other part of the room by a sliding door, which gave our 17 year old son a little privacy and his own tv. One annoying feature was that the bathroom sink was part of the bedroom, which made it difficult to see early in the morning as my wife and I prepared to go eat breakfast while our teens slept. The complimentary breakfast was quite good. Fresh cooked eggs, bacon, sausage and hash browns were available each morning, along with 3 types of cold cereal; 2 types of fruit juice; cook your own waffles; yogurt; toasts and bread. I found the hash browns to be restaurant quality. Overall, pleased with the stay, but wish the bathroom sink was in the bathroom.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We drove out from AZ to see our new grand baby. Niece.  We were very happy that this hotel allowed pets and we happy with the room. The maid staff was very polite and helped getting us clean blankets  And towels when we asked The front desk staff was awesome and very helpful printing out any Directions to help us get to and from various places. Breakfast was also delicious and had everything anyone could ask For and there was staff on hand to keep tables cleaned and floors  Litter free.  We will return.   : )
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nothing about this hotel wowed me. Even in an average hotel, if the customer service is spectacular, I can overlook almost anything else. Front Desk wasn't rude, but they didn't go out of their way to treat me and my family who booked 2 rooms, like valued guests. Breakfast was okay. Could have had real bacon instead of turkey bacon, but I guess that's a way they save money.  The rooms were okay. If you have to use the sofa sleeper, you won't get a comfortable nights rest. Also weird having the bathroom sink outside of the bathroom(was inside the bedroom) bring your own toilet paper...they use the cheapest quality of everything. Towels are so rough scratched my skin. They are in dire need of replacing. All that said, for $85, free parking and a do-able breakfast, in a clean/safe
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that our front desk was not attentive or friendly to you and your family during your stay.  To ensure that a situation like yours doesn't happen again, I have instructed my team  to welcome all our guests with a friendly hello and to address any guest issues as soon as it is brought to their attention.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: I am reluctant to review this hotel because it is the best bargain in southern California. Spotless, excellent location, very good breakfast so low in price it is scary. My reluctance in writing this review is that too many people will start visiting this property.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We got a decent price for the room and I'd say it is a solid 3 star hotel. Room was in"older" condition. The hot/cold water in shower didn't work so great.  But again, for the money it was a fine room.  If I had to do over again, I'd probably try and pay a bit more to get a bit more.  Note: We had a small dog. We paid $20 per night and I am pretty sure we got the "Pet friendly" room. Code for one of the crappier rooms they offer.
Manager Response: none
