Summary: Please modernized the room. The lighting was so dim, the ventilation/heating vents need some re-working, The wash basin needed to be relocated. It was really an annoyance for it to be located at the foot of the beds. Do a regular maintenance checks on the appliances.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There’s plenty of attractions not that far away from this location. Great price compared to staying around Anaheim. Parking is tight due to location but easy access to the interstates. Nice and quiet with plenty of choices for breakfast. Would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Best Western PLUS is supposed to provide a more premium experience and this property certainly did deliver!    The room smelled fresh and clean. Everything worked properly. The furniture, towels, sheets, and other amenities were in excellent condition and definitely of higher quality than a standard BW hotel.   There was a parking garage with a roving security officer.  The pool and jacuzzi were operational, fun and in great condition.   I wasn’t able to take advantage of the free breakfast as I left too early every day.   I did eat at The Hat, a delicious restaurant with pastrami or roast beef sandwiches. The Hat is a 1/4 mike away north of the hotel.   I highly recommend this hotel if you are staying in the Lake Forest area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We always stay at the Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum because they have a wonderful hot breakfast station with a friendly fellow serving us AND because of the 24 hour fitness AND because of the friendly front desk staff AND because of the rooms are really suites!  On this trip we accidentally left medication in the fridge and got an immediate call that they had it for us t safely in the fridge by the front desk. WOW!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was able to rest with the help of my pain meds. If not for them I don't think I could have rested with out it. Also if there was going to be work done to the hotel or around it I would have gone to another location,
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations and for the noise from the construction taking place next door. Unfortunately, we have no control over what the surrounding properties do or what time they choose to do it. We have asked on numerous occasions for the contractor not to start prior to 9am and to complete their day by 5pm. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: We stay here annually and are never disappointed. It's usually quiet though this time we did have some loud neighbors.  The breakfast is excellent.  Staff is very helpful. Good location and reasonable rates.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was in Irvine for a business trip. Visited the city when everything was around $200+/night for some reason.  Best Western was slightly more than $130. Location is good-it is close to the highway, but not facing the highway, and is 5 minutes from Irvine Spectrum and 10 minutes from UC Irvine.  Both may be driven locally to avoid freeway traffic.   Hotel was pretty nice, rooms were clean, liked the 2-room bedroom/living room separation format. Facilities were nice, breakfast was nice (if the usual continental breakfast), parking was free and easily accessible.  I'd probably use it again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I'm pleased to hear that you found value in our accommodations, amenities and our location was centrally located to your destination. Thank you again for your review, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Room was huge. Big TV. Clean and neat property inside and out. We'll definitely stay there again. Close to everything. We stayed at a suite with two queen beds and a separate room with a couch, desk, coffee table, dresser, and fridge. I couldn't believe the price was around a hundred bucks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I'm pleased to hear that you enjoyed our two queen suite and that you found the property was well maintained.  Thank you again for your review.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: I felt like royalty at this hotel. The front desk staff were so professional and helpful. All of the staff at this hotel we’re very professional. I really enjoyed my stay. My goal was to rest and relax and that is exactly what I did.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I am proud of our team for being professional and helpful with you during your stay. Thank you again for your kind words. The staff and I would love to provide you with another relaxing stay in the future.

Summary: I enjoyed every part of the room and the hotel is nice and kept up well. The breakfast was delicious although I was surprised they did not have bagels and cream cheese but everything they did provide was tasty. The only reason why I gave an average rating and not excellent was because when I asked if they had a room and I told the gentleman that I needed a room for the night and possibly another night due to being forced to evacuate due to the Canyon2 Fires, he showed no concern for my ordeal. I playfully asked if there was an evacuation discount or if he could possibly check to see if I could get a slighter lower rate. I was going to stay there anyway but he didn't even bat an eyelash about it. He just smirked and said your total is $$$. I gave him my credit card and off I went
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. We appreciate your kind comments regarding the breakfast and the room accommodations; however, I sincerely apologize that my front desk clerk was not empathetic to your situation. I understand how stressful it can be having to gather your family and leave your home in a moments notice. I have taken your feedback and addressed it with the individual and the rest of the team to ensure that your experience is not repeated. I am grateful for the feedback you provided so we are able to continually improve our hotel.  It would be our pleasure to have you stay with us again in the future to show you our positive strides taken to enhance your experience with us.

Summary: on my stay I got good price average $100 per night with 2 beds nice room and nice breakfast. staffs are nice. will back for sure. location is nice area. a lot of shop and restaurant are around where you live.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the two queen suite, complimentary breakfast buffet, and the staff was friendly. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel was better than our expectation. The people were friendly and willing to help. The room was spacious. I like having the two rooms as I could read while my husband watched sports. My only suggestion is to make sure you spray the waffle machine as mine stuck and was hard to get out!
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to post a review of your stay. I am proud of our team for being helpful, friendly and providing you with an enjoyable experience. Thank you for your feedback regarding the waffle iron. I'm sorry to hear that the waffle was sticking and we will make sure there is spray available to prevent this from happening to other guests. The staff and I would like to thank you for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Stayed here while visiting my 96 year old aunt. Was very pleasantly surprised by hotel. Expected serviceable, got much more. The rooms were very large. Two queen  beds in one room, and another separate room(pocket door ) with couch, chair, tv, fridge and microwave. Housekeeping was as good or better than any five star hotel we have stayed at. Breakfast was very good and made fresh. Only con is it is the same daily, bit there are enough choices for variety on a longer stay. Front desk people super nice and attentive. We had a broken lock and ten minutes later someone was there to fix it! If you put out your do not disturb sign housekeeping leaves you a note with a number to call when you are ready. Up until 2pm you can get housekeeping .  Definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you found the accommodations pleasant, clean, and the staff was attentive and nice.  Thank you again for your review and recommendation.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Very good night, Beautiful room clean, quiet and nice suite. The staff was very attentive to our needs, The breakfast is excellent they have a chef that was making eggs bacon sausage and hash browns. The staff during breakfast kept the area clean and well stocked too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I truly appreciate your comments regarding the clean accommodations, the attentive staff and the excellent breakfast buffet.  Once more, thank you for posting your review. We look forward to having you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Irvine place was very nice clean quiet very mind relaxing In the morning the staff was very helpful food was amazing everything with clean nice and then order I would recommend this hotel to anyone that is traveling in Irvine or Anaheim orange county area
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to post a review of your stay. It's great to hear that you found the accommodations clean, relaxing and the staff helpful. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Great sound proofing and location. Even with nearby construction we did not hear it in our room. Perfect two-room set up with microwave and refrigerator. PET FRIENDLY!!!   Great value for travel to beaches and amusement parks.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. It's great to hear that our hotel was centrally located to your destinations and that our pet friendly suites met your accommodation needs. Thank you again for sharing your comments with us. We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: The hotel and hotel staff was GREAT! Got everything I needed and you beat it for the price you pay for. It will be my go to Hotel when I'm in the Irvine area. Rene will take care of all your questions or needs,very professional.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I truly appreciate your comments regarding the value you found in the amenities and service our staff provided to you.  Thank you again for your kind words.  The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: They provided great service and  had an amazing staff. The breakfast had variety. Very clean rooms.  We were in town for my mother's funeral and the room was perfect for our needs. Fair price. Definitely will stay again when back in town.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. Please accept our condolences for the loss of your mother.  I'm pleased that you enjoyed all the options our breakfast has to offer and that the staff provided great service. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.  We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: We were surprised at how nice the Best Western Irvine Spectrum was compared to the price we paid. A great find. The breakfast was made to order, the wait staff was helpful, and the facilities were clean.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you found the accommodations clean and affordable and the staff helpful.  Thank you again for your review.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: breakfast needs work,odor strong in rooms..staff good.close to good restaurants,easy on off expressway..shopping close, all freeway near by ..nice pool lousy work out room dated old easy to get hurt.other than that????
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize that there was an odor in your room and that we did not move you into another room once this issue was brought to our attention.  To prevent this from happening again, my team is going into all the guest rooms to verify that there are no odors prior to all guests arrivals.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Free parking New rooms, lots of space  Easy access from parking lot, fair price,   close to all.nice pool and staff. Was not happy with breakfast or coffee and I'm a pretty easy person to satisfy. Would stay again if had tbe chance.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The breakfast is awesome.  The room not so much.
Summary: That was the best breakfast I have ever had in a hotel.  The front desk staff could not have been nicer or more helpful.  The room was oddly set up.  The sink was in the bedroom and not in the bathroom.  We did hear our upstairs neighbors walking around.  Luckily they went to bed early.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We live in central California and love to visit So Cal when we can as we grew up there.  We decided to find a place affordable and off the beaten path so we could drive to enjoy all the places we visit in Orange County while we're there! This was a great find and we were able to fit our family in one room for a decent price! It's a little dated but definitely worth what we paid! Would visit again!
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. It's great to hear that you found the accommodations clean, affordable and spacious for your families vacation. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but doesn't match the lake forest neighborhood
Summary: We were not expecting to find an airport like hotel at lake forest. The neighborhood is supposed to be very high level, but it just a normal hotel, next to the highway 5. The wifi was not working very well, neither the ICE machine.  In the mean time, the room was big, with a kind of living room separate d from the bed room, this is really nice. The bed was comfy (firm but not too much). The AC is integrated and not so noisy (i don't like the noisy AC machines). The breakfast is always the same (eggs/bacon/sausages/hash browns) but it's nice for a short period. The hotel is not that far from the beaches but need to take highways, hopefully we could take carpool line to make it in 30 minutes.  I think I would come back if the price is not too high.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I sincerely apologize that you were experiencing issues with the WIFI during your stay and that the ice machines were depleted due to the high demand. We are working with our internet service provider to provide more reliable service for all our guests and we are working on adding an additional ice machine to help with the demand during busy times. I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: They allow pets! The exterior of the building is a bit run down looking, but the inside is a little better. The cable was shut off the day we were checking out, which was lame. But overall, it's an okay hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your stay at our hotel.  I sincerely apologize that the cable was not working on the day of your departure.  To ensure that a situation like yours doesn't happen again, we are currently in the process of upgrading our cable to HD and the service should be more reliable with a better picture.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Great hotel, nice staff, clean hotel, good breakfast, easy access to 5 Fwy.  Called to check availability, Ethan at front desk was super courteous and informative.  We would definitely stay here again.  Thanks BW.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  We truly appreciate your comments regarding Ethan and the assistance he provided to you. We are glad you enjoyed the hot breakfast buffet and that you found the hotel to be nice and clean.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Best Western has remodeled their hotels, are focusing on customer service and have won us over.  We had a nice stay in Irvine and would recommend this hotel to our friends. Breakfast was cooked to order and was so good.  The staff was helpful and friendly and never made us feel like we were a burden.  The property is in a good location and is clean and well kept.  We'll be back as soon as we can!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I am glad to read that you were pleased with new furniture and bedding we have added to the rooms. I am proud of our team and the commitment they have to providing excellent service to all our guests. We appreciate your acknowledgment of their efforts. Thank you again for sharing your comments with us.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: The check in was fast and easy. Staff at the front desk was professional and friendly. Room was super nice! Very spacious great for business trips! Bathroom was pretty big and clean, nice deep tub. Tv, fridge, micro & AC worked, everything was super clean. Clean carpeting. Good phone service. Clean bedding and sheets. Wifi worked. Nice size parking lot located at property with plenty of parking. Big clean towels. Elevator located at property. Nice swimming pool area. Love the decor. The sink was super cool. No bad oders! Good house keeping. Complimentary breakfast is available upon stay. Very quiet during my visit.
Manager Response: The staff and I read your review, and would like to thank you for writing such delightful things about the staff, accommodations and amenities.  I am glad to read that you had a fantastic stay.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Although the pet friendly hotel rooms have absolutely no view (just a large walled-in patio on the second floor), the room was very nice with a real living room and a large bedroom with 2 comfortable queen beds. Two TV's, nice water flow, clean, everything was perfect.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ideal for what we needed - place to sleep and pet -friendly.  Room clean and comfortable. Breakfast adequate. Withing walking distance of Starbucks and an excellent Pizza Studio - recommended. Irvine Spectrum nearby.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Big suite with new furnishingss, great breakfast
Summary: This is a businessman's location not far from the freeway.  (Noisy outside, but not inside the room). In a NICE office park and the hotel is up to the needs of a busy executive.  It suited these two tourists visiting nearby friends just fine: a two-room suite with TVs in each room, a separate desk and lamp, a little balcony, a big bath with lots of towels, a comfortable bed. Everything looked new and freshly decorated.  The breakfast was cooked by a chef on the spot in the dining room,so the eggs, sausage,etc were really fresh and tasty.  The dining room overlooks a pretty swimming pool. But I really wish Best Western would lower their shower heads--way too high for a short person to adjust them!
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the review regarding your recent stay at our property.  Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: The Best Western Spectrum is a great price value for this area. Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Breakfast actually has a cook to make eggs, hash browns, bacon and sausage.  Much better than your average "continental" breakfast.  This is "continental plus".
Manager Response: none

Summary: Maybe it was just the people who stayed here at the same time as me, maybe it is the fact that this place needs an urgent facelift, or maybe it's just that you feel like you are in a standard motel... Whatever it is, this place is cheap for a reason.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the review regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements such as painting the exterior, updating the room furniture, and upgrading the cable to HD to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: Paid almost $140 for a single night.  Took 7 minutes to get hot water.  When I unfolded a bath towel to dry off a clump of somebody's hair fell out.  Room smelled musty.  Nightstand lights didn't work.  Responded to online advertisement for $88/night but told by desk clerk when I was checking this teaser rate is never honored... always more expensive.  - Waste of money!!!  Pay $20-$30 more somewhere else and you'll be glad you did!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the hot water and the misunderstanding regarding the on-line offer. The search engines will always show what our lowest available rate is based on the dates of stay, you are required to enter the dates you would like to stay to see what rates are available, I apologize that it is not explained more clearly on the site and can understand how confusing it may be. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: This hotel has a good location, close to freeways and the Irvine Spectrum. Staff very professional and helpful. We will be staying at this hotel again in the future. The breakfast staff was on tp of things making sure area was clean and you had everything that you wanted.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  We truly appreciate your comments regarding the hot breakfast buffet and that you found the staff to be professional and helpful.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel while attending a conference in the area. The rooms are clean, beds are comfortable so it was sufficient. The breakfast was mediocre at best and the supplies were not kept up sufficiently because the room was understaffed. There was only one working ice machine in the entire place - and we were there in August! It's hot out. Ice is kind of important!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. The situation you described regarding the breakfast being mediocre is truly regrettable. We are sorry for your experience and we are working on adding additional staff to help maintain and keep the breakfast fully stocked.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with you feedback. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in town.

Summary: stayed here for 3 nights with the wife on a leisure trip to laguna beach/newport. Hotel is right off the the 5 freeway in a convenient location. parking can get dicey especially late at night when we checked in (spots in the garage are very small). they had one gentleman working the counter when we checked in and he was busy helping another guest so we had to wait (not long) but we had no idea if anyone was at the desk or not. The lady in front of us got fed up and left. but after this we had a very nice experience. the room was large and comfortable. internet worked fine. the breakfast dining area is muggy/crowded especially at peak times. egg/hashbrowns are served by a cook and otherwise they had waffles and pastries/cereal with some fruit. dining area was a bit uncomfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I'm pleased to hear that you found value in our hot breakfast buffet and our location conveniently located to restaurants, shopping and beaches. Thank you again for your review, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay.   breakfast well above average.  Good family place, lots of kids.
Summary: Good location for our travel.  Many near by restaurants to choose from with wide variety of types of food.  A cook cooking eggs, sausage and bacon fresh each morning.  Very clean and well appointed dining area.  Staff super freiendly and on the ball.  Hide-a-bed was not good even as they go. Mattress cover was loud crackly plastic and bottom sheet would not stay tucked in - uncomfortable for an adult.  Nice room layout with separate bedroom area with TVs in each room.  I'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We appreciate you letting us know about the sofa sleepers and the loud plastic. We just recently replaced all of our guest room sofas and it was an oversight on our part by not removing the plastic on the mattress.  We are sorry for this issue, but are happy to read that you and your family enjoyed the breakfast and that the staff was friendly and helpful throughout your stay.  Thank you again for sharing your comments with us.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: Hotel offered great amenities for a great price, room was very spacious and we liked the privacy of a corner room. Would stay here again if I'm ever back in this area. Would recommend this place to friend and family. Looks like great place to stay for families.
Manager Response: The team and I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we truly appreciate you recommending us to your friends and family. Once more, thank you for posting your review. We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Expected more from this hotel in this upscale area
Summary: Have stayed at other Best Westerns in the past so I was a bit disappointed in this one. Felt it was a bit old and not kept us as well as it should have been. Some areas in our room were fine well others not so good. Torn shower curtains, safe & alarm clock not working, big red spot on carpet. The breakfast was good and the employees working in that area very nice. Probably won't stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Good 3 star hotel. Clean and friendly staff. Large room. Fridge microwave coffee maker. Bathroom in good condition. Everything works well. WAsher and dryer on the premises at $2 to run each machine but there is only 1 wAsher and 1 dryer. Plenty of free parking and the pool looked nice. Free breakfast was okay. Basic but good variety and it is all fresh.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I'm glad that you found the rooms to be spacious and in good condition. We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

Summary: Very satisfying stay in this hotel,  the staff very kind and responsible.  Breakfast is great, rooms are great, overall my stay was very pleasant.  Definitely will recommend this hotel if you are going to be in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property. We truly appreciate your kind comments regarding the staff, the accommodations, and the breakfast. Once more, thank you for posting your review. We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary: beautiful room and very central to where we wanted to be, good rate. Very friendly staff at breakfast , great breakfast items. I am vegan and really appreciated the options I had Definitely recommend this hotel
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  We truly appreciate your comments regarding our friendly breakfast staff and that the variety of breakfast options were to your liking.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: We were looking for a hotel next to the Irvine Spectrum so we could walk over to it a have a cocktail, shop and walk back to the hotel. Turns out it's not close to the Spectrum. You would have to drive. As Best Western Plus hotels go, this was a bad experience. The TVs were analog, not HD. WiFi was unavailable during our stay. The toilet was broke upon arrival. No shuttle service available to the Spectrum. We left that night because it was so disappointing.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize that we were not able to meet or exceed your expectations. I appreciate your feed back and wanted to share with you that we are in the process of updating all our guest room televisions to HD and we are working closely with our High Speed Internet Provider to provide an easier more stable WiFi connection for all of our guests. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: We stayed two nights at this hotel and we well impressed with quality and services of the hotel. Breakfast was well stock and attended were keeping tables clean. Room well decorated and clean. Parking is tight and challenging to find space for late arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are glad that you had a good stay and that you were impressed with the hotel and services. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Young lady at the front desk was awesome, great customer service !!!  Its hard to find, its on this little dinky street that doesn't even look like a street, its more like a merge opening, right above the freeway, you can only go in, no out. Its in an area that is still under construction like office complexes and they are still under construction.   The parking leaves much to be desired, all spaces are compact and big pickups and SUVs take up 2 spaces leaving no parking. More handicap parking is needed.   Rooms are as expected and as shown on website, could use a few hard pillows, all too soft. Breakfast here is a bonus with eggs and bacon/sausage & potatoes, in addition to toast. waffles, cereal, muffins.   The pool & hot tub were probably nice but way too many kids for us to
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to to write a review of your experience with us. We apologize that it was difficult to locate our hotel and that parking was challenging. Our front desk staff is available 24 hours a day to assist guests with directions or to assist with additional parking locations. We are happy to hear that you did enjoy our breakfast and that the front desk was friendly. Thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary: This was our first stay at the Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel.  The staff were amazing.  They were extremely helpful and courteous.  The hot breakfast is made on-site with a cook on staff.  You can special order if you desire.  The room we stayed in was beautiful and spacious.  I recommend this hotel if you are in Irvine.  You are not far from Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are so pleased to hear that you had a great experience with the staff and the accommodations. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: If you are in the Irvine area I highly recommend your booking your reservation at this hotel.  The staff were extremely helpful and courteous.  The breakfast served is freshly cooked in front of you.  If you need something special they are very accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property. The staff and I truly appreciate you recommending our hotel. We look forward to having you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel, definitely coming back if I can
Summary: I loved everything about this stay. Made our time in LA that much more amazing. The pool was so nice, the hot tub helped us relax our sore muscles, and prepare for the next couple days of travel. The breakfast was delicious, and all the employees we came in contact with were so nice and helpful. Thanksss!!!!
Manager Response: The team and I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your stay. It is great to hear that you had an awesome experience during your stay. The staff and I would like to thank you again for your kind words. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: First time staying at a Best Western Plus...will definitely be staying again on our future trips.   The whole staff were accommodating, friendly, courteous and provided the best quality we have seen in a long time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I'm proud of our team for making your stay a pleasant one. Thank you again for your kind words. The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: My daughter and I recently stayed a couple of nights at the B/W Plus on a short trip to the area.  We found the property to be easy to find in a quite area.  The facility was not fancy, but was clean and the staff was attentive.  The room was nice with 2 double beds and a sitting room.  The included breakfast (scrambled eggs, hash browns, sausage & toast) was excellent and was served by staff members.  I always ask one question - would you stay there again?  Yes I'd stay here if I ever decide to visit the area again.  Thanks B/W.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the accommodations, the breakfast, and that the staff was attentive and friendly. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel at least 6 times. Honestly I'm not sure how they can be so reasonable and still turn a profit. If you have kids this is the ONLY hotel in the OC that you can have 6 people in the same room, still be comfortable and have an outstanding free breakfast at any where near this price.   Did I mention the breakfast? Eggs (as in from an actual egg), hashbrowns, sausage, turkey bacon, juice, waffle maker (kids really dig this), muffins, yogurt, milk, cereal, fresh fruit, oatmeal, toppings bar, coffee and toast. All gratis.   Rooms have an entry room with a TV chair, desk, pull out couch, fridge, microwave, the adjoining large room has two queens, closet, TV, and bathroom. The place has recently been remodeled to update the décor but they kept the price the
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  We truly appreciate your comments regarding the hot breakfast buffet and that you found the hotel to be nice and enjoyed the new decor. We appreciate you letting us know that of the issue with the work trucks. We are sorry for this issue, but if it does happen again please notify us so that we may address the issue.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Overall we were completely satisfied with our stay! And would definitely return to that location.  We would also recommend others to stay there.  Hopefully next time there will be more than one washer and dryer.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to read that you would recommend our hotel and we will work on adding more washers and dryers to our property. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: The rooms are very roomy and clean. The staff was very welcoming and attentive. We stayed at the hotel while we were in town for my sons water polo tournament and after spending the entire day in the sun it was so nice coming back to our hotel to relax and get some rest. The breakfast was great and plenty to start our day!! We will definitely be back and would recommend this hotel to all our friend and family!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I truly appreciate your comments regarding your stay and how much you enjoyed your suite, complimentary breakfast, and our friendly staff. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: We were in the area to visit family.  Check in was a breeze and the room was very nice.  We had a separate living room which was nice.  We were traveling with our dogs and ther was a nice grass area just across the street and a great area for a walk with them.  Close to shopping but quiet.  The bed was super comfy, better than most "hotel beds".
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review. We are happy to hear that you and your pets had a comfortable stay with us. Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We look forward to seeing you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: Friendly, courteous and accommodating staff. Nice, clean and updated rooms, beautifully decorated lobby, full breakfast and in-room coffee and conveniences. Will stay there again should the need arise.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property. We truly appreciate your kind comments regarding the staff, the accommodations, and the breakfast. Once more, thank you for posting your review. We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Several stays and really liking the hotel
Summary: We've had some odd schedules with our business travel and the hotels seem to be overpriced in the Newport, Irvine area. Some way over priced. We made two trips to the BWP Irvine Spectrum. The last trip was a bust on a deal in San Diego but the hotel was soooo nice to come to and call it a day. The desk people are always very nice and super accommodating. My room is always quiet and very comfortable. Breakfast staff people were so nice and friendly, the food was very good and the waffles are a treat. If you like simple and plain, this is the ticket. For a small breakfast room, the variety is very nice. This is a great home away from home for my business trips. No complaints at all but wonder about the bowl sink on top of the dresser near the TV. Just odd. Will be back many times,
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I truly appreciate your comments regarding the hot breakfast buffet and that you found the hotel to be nice and clean.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Close to food and fun   Outdoor mall close by. Easy parking, easy access to rooms pool is nice and clean rooms have separate living room with large bedroom area bed is not bad for comfort   Could have had another set of towels already in room but all in all good value
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I'm pleased to hear that you  found the location convenient and that you enjoyed your room accommodations and amenities.  Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: The location of this hotel was well centered to shopping and dinning areas. It was only a few miles away from Laguna Beach and Dana Point. This is a perfect hotel stay for anyone who wants to spend a weekend at the beach but does not want to pay the high prices of being on PCH. You will get great service and save $$.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are please to hear that you were able to getaway and chose to stay with us. It was nice to hear that we were able to help you save some money while you visited the local attractions. Thank you again for sharing your comments with us. We look forward to hosting you again on your next getaway.

Summary: We started off with our reservation no longer confirmed because they OVERBOOKED.  I had to sleep in the same bed with my sister and they offered us NOTHING in return!  The man at the desk was dull and a poor communicator. We had kids jumping in the room above us and called the front desk.  We needed to call twice because they didn't send anyone right away.   Hotel and breakfast was okay; service was disappointing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. I sincerely apologize that you did not receive the room type you reserved and that there was noise from surrounding rooms. It is not our practice to overbook any rooms, and I will work with my staff to prevent this from happening again. We do hope that you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

Summary: the 5 is right there close to both southern califorina beaches and able to get to resorts and amusement parks with ease  the sombreros Mexican restaurant nearby is amazing  and very fair priced  also the breakfast is made fresh while you watch  thanks best western
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had a pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your comments. I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Too slow internet service. Even on my daily report, they didn't solve the problem. I was almost at the stage to leave the hotel but after changed the room, it was good. Except Internet rest were fine. I liked their breakfast service
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations and for the issues you experienced with the internet. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be sharing the feedback you gave us with our internet provider to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Only chose this hotel because they had suites that slept 6, and we were traveling as a large family group.  Plenty of parking, easy check in and spacious rooms.  The best part of the stay was the complimentary breakfast.  Lots to choose from, including hot options such as scrambled egg, bacon and sausage, freshly cooked by the friendly and efficient cook.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  We truly appreciate your comments regarding our spacious suites and the hot breakfast buffet.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: The location is pretty good if you have the car, Disneyland and several beautiful beaches are very closed, also sanclemont outlet, cidatel outlet is not too far. breakfast is good and room is comfortable. only the water is small and hard to make a good temperature for shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We apologize that you experienced difficulties with the water temperature, we are currently replacing the cartridges to help correct this issue.  We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: Hotel needs remodeling - not just paint this and that and call it good. We are not trying to put you guys down, we want you to succeed. Please update and remodel this Best Western. Ethernet connection to internet is needed in each room. The way breakfast is served needs improvement. Overall we were satisfied with this hotel, but the vacation would be much better in a more updated hotel. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we are currently in the process of replacing all the sofas, chairs, carpet and bedding in the guest rooms. We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Nice looking hotel. Friendly desk service. Odd room: the bathroom sink is not in the bathroom; it's in the room itself. Strange architectural design. Breakfast was just okay. There was no cream cheese for the bagels, nor was there any jam or jelly. Not the best breakfast one can enjoy.
Manager Response: Your feedback is very important to us, so thank you for sharing. It would be our pleasure to have you stay with us again in the future to show you our positive strides taken to enhance your experience with us.

Summary: Old saggy mattresses, bad food. We came for a wedding and had to spend 4 nights there.  End up with back and neck pain. Could not wait to get out from that hotel.   Never again at that place. Would not recommend to anybody.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize that the mattress was uncomfortable for you during your stay.  To prevent this from happening again, my team is going into all the guest rooms to verify all the mattress have been properly rotated for maximum comfort.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Great hotel for the price. The free parking and breakfast makes it even a better deal. Only drawback was upon check in, I requested a room away from the elevators, what did I get? A room by the elevator and also in front of the outside staircase.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to enjoy our hot breakfast buffet and complimentary parking. I apologize that we were not able to honor your room location request, we always try our best to accommodate all guest requests when available. Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: Had to come suddenly because our home had flooded and we needed somewhere to be. We booked and while the outside is nothing exciting, the rooms were beautiful! Totally not what I was expecting! Two rooms - a sitting area and a bedroom, both of which were immaculate. Totally spacious enough for my family of 5 to spread out. The hot breakfast in the morning was great to fill my kids up on before taking them to school. The staff allowed me a super early check in as well as a late check out. They were very accommodating. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had a pleasant stay with us under such a stressful situation.  I'm so pleased to hear that our staff was able to assist you with an early check-in and late check-out, and that you enjoyed the accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast. We hope that everything goes well with the repairs to your home. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Good size, but didn't make up for the rest.
Summary: I was surprised to see how large the room was with the single king and hot tub. However, there were way too many downsides with this hotel to make up for it, and I'm generally not very picky.  All I wanted was a place to sleep and maybe watch tv.  Well, the AC doesn't work for one.  The room was permanently musty and too warm to comfortably sleep in. It stayed at about 76 degrees in the room the entire time according to the thermostat. My sheets had dark brown stains on them near the seam, and the tv had two black parallel lines going through it. Also, there is a shared balcony between all the rooms on our side of the building on the second floor.  A little disturbing when the walkway is right next to the bed.   If the ac worked, and the price was lower, this would've been a
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that the air conditioner was not working properly and that the television had lines through the channels. My staff usually will respond to all guest issues immediately and they will send maintenance up to repair the issue or relocate the guest into another room if maintenance is not available.  I apologize if these items were brought to my staffs attention and they did not address them.  I will follow up with my team and make sure they are testing these items prior to checking a guest into the suite, so no future issues will occur.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary: This hotel was so nice and clean.  My family loved it.  We stayed here to go to Disneyland.  It was only a 20 minute drive.  We especially loved to hot breakfast.  Someone cooks it right in front of us so it was nice and fresh.  It had scrambled eggs, hash browns, sausage and bacon.  They even served Sunkist oranges.  My favorite!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  We truly appreciate your comments regarding the hot breakfast buffet and that you found the hotel to be nice and clean. The staff works really hard to provide a nice clean environment for our guests, we appreciate the recognition of their efforts.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: After we left our room, housekeeping came. Upon our return, our son's water bottle had something extra added to it. It was now brown instead of clear. Housekeeping couldn't keep a straight face while I tried to find out what happened. Omar, the housekeeping manager kept laughing. He didn't take the situation serious until I started writing down all their names.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the review regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations and will review the security footage of the conversation and take any and all necessary action. It is our policy to take all situations seriously and respond appropriately. It was disheartening to read that the housekeeper that serviced your room would tamper with your sons water bottle, she has been with us for several years and is one of my better housekeepers this is completely out of character for her. I apologize for any worry or inconvenience this has caused you and your family.   Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, best price in the area!
Summary: Clean room, friendly staff, great variety at breakfast. Great price. I'm quite picky when it comes to mattresses and pillows and these beds were super comfy. We'd definitely stay there again! Thanks!!
Manager Response: The staff and I read your review, and would like to thank you for writing such favorable things about our staff, facility and our complimentary hot breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Surprised.  Just a stopping point.  Hotel was very nice and clean.  There was a little bit of wear on the bathroom in our room - but just aesthetics.  Room was spacious, beds excellent.  We had 2Q and sofa bed setup - a suite.  Only thing I didn't like re the room was that the bathroom sink was on the main credenza in the bedroom - ie., not tucked away by the bathroom.  Exterior grounds - HUGE swarm of bees on the ground - dying?  Very gross.  But if you can get into your room, everything is great.  Breakfast was so nice - actual service and plates (non-paper).  Everything was very clean!
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you really enjoyed your suite with two queen beds and the complimentary hot breakfast. Please accept our apologies for the bees and the mess they caused. They were quite unexpected and we tried to address them as quickly and as efficiently as possible. I am please to announce that they have found a new home and are no longer an issue.  Thank you again for sharing your comments with us.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: This hotel has a great location with easy access.  We loved having 2 rooms so our daughter could sleep in.  There was a soundproof door between the rooms and a TV in each.   The staff was friendly, very clean, comfortable beds.   Really have no complaints at all.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: My staff and I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your stay. We are glad to hear that your stay was enjoyable and we hope to see you again next time your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Best bang for your buck. Not a 4 star but good non the less
Summary: Two TVs in two rooms separated by a closing door. Good turn down service. Great location. Close driving distance to everything and super short walking distance to restaurants McDonald's and convenience store. If you're looking for the best possible value this is it. If you are looking for something high end keep looking. Would absolutely return again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I'm pleased to hear that you found value in our services and our location conveniently located to restaurants and stores. Thank you again for your review, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: When I walked in I was seriously very surprised. A king size suite was perfect for my husband and I on our getaway. Everyone in the staff was super friendly and very helpful. I would definitely recommend This hotel to my friends.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your king suite and that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful. Thank you again for your kind words.  The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: It was a decent stay for the price. I guess the only real thing I have to sort of complain about, is the view. Our view was of an old, unkempt parking lot. Looked like Eastern Europe in a bad way. The free breakfast is always something I look forward too at least once during a stay, especially hot breakfast. Theirs was really good especially considering it's free. The staff serving breakfast seemed extra nice. Always a good touch. I would say a bit of an above average stay for a best western. Unfortunately some of the other tenants where loud, the guy next to us slamming things around the middle of the night. Babies crying upstairs and the person above it just seemed to like to stomp around as they walked. If I didn't have to deal with that crap it would have been even better.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay.  The situation you described regarding the noise from the surrounding guests is truly regrettable.  We are very sorry for your experience.  To prevent this from happening again, please contact the front desk so that we may contact the other guests or relocate you to a quieter location.  The staff and I appreciate your comments, as it will only help us to improve.    We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

Summary: We came here for a soccer tournament. Rosie Mohr, the general manager was great. She set up a group rate and room block for my daughters team. We were able to get a very good rate, and truly appreciated it. The rooms were great, all suites and newly remodeled (so it seemed) the staff was very friendly and the breakfast was the usual hotel breakfast. I only wished they had creamer for the coffee, I would of been in heaven if it were vanilla creamer. Only bummer was the very loud people above who decided to make a lot of noise at 1am. It sounded like they were bowling on our ceiling. Great location to food and shopping. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I'm so pleased to hear that you and your team enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to enjoy our hot breakfast buffet. Thank you again for your kind words.  The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for our trip to Southern California.  It is right off the freeway, which is nice.  The breakfast was better than some of my recent stays at other places.  My kids loved how housekeeping put their stuffed animals on the center of the bed everyday.  We would come back and they would run to see if they were there.  Only issue was the water was off for a while one night.  I would stay here again, but if we do Disneyland again, I might stay near the park since parking at Disneyland was more hassle than I was expecting.  I will stay here for other trips down there, though.
Manager Response: The staff and I read your review, and would like to thank you for writing such favorable things about our housekeeping. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience you experienced for the water being shut off during your stay, we had to repair a pipe in the lobby and it could not be avoided.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: They gave us a smoking room and I did not ask for one, we are highly allergic so cigarettes and they would accommodate
Summary: They gave us a smoking room and I did not ask for one, we are highly allergic so cigarettes and they would accommodate us, worst experience ever. We are still stuffed up and have allergies from it!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for completing a review regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations and not being able to change the room type from a smoking room to a non smoking room due to being sold out. We will always try to change room types for guests that book smoking rooms in error when available. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at the best western Irvine Spectrum. From the check with their great staff to the breakfast and check out. Everything was perfect. I really enjoyed my stay. The hearty breakfast was wonderful. I definitely recommend this place and will stay again.
Manager Response: My staff and I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your stay. We are glad to hear that your stay was enjoyable and we hope to see you again next time your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Won't stay anywhere else!. All rooms have a sitting room and a bedroom. On this last trip stayed one night at another way more expensive hotel and the next morning called this Best Western Plus. Yeah, they had a room for us.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I'm thrilled to hear that you found our hotel to be comfortable and you plan on staying with us again in the future.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again.

Summary: It was a very nice place. It was just out of hearing distance from traffic but dinning and shopping are just minutes away. Staff was personable and professional. The room was clean and very comfortable.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am glad to read that you were pleased with our suites and that the staff  was professional and friendly.  Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We would look forward to seeing you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary Heading: Should be named "Pretty-Good Western" or "Second-Best Western"
Summary: Nothing is wrong with this hotel ... it's just a bit off. The first thing is the truly bizarre room design which has the only sink on the counter next to the TV and right in front of the bed!  I was alone so it didn't matter, but if I was with my wife, we had better be on the exact same schedule or the person in bed would be subjected to the sights and sounds of washing and gargling and such.  That by itself would be  deal breaker if i was not traveling alone. At least the toilet was in another room. ;-)  Room was large, clean and had pretty nice furniture.  Service was so-so. With the exception of one well dressed young man who was very friendly, the front desk staff seemed morose and did not understand the whole hospitality thing about greeting customers. On a couple of
Manager Response: The staff and I read your comments about your stay with us.  I am so disappointed that you were not greeted immediately when entering the lobby and that the staff was not attentive to your needs during your stay.  Please accept my apology.  As this hotel’s manager, I can assure you that I have addressed your comments with the staff to ensure your experience is not repeated.  I am grateful for the feedback you provided so we are able to continually improve our hotel.    It would be our pleasure to have you stay with us again in the future to show you our positive strides taken to enhance your experience with us.

Summary: Room was clean and comfortable.  I could get to my room easily and felt secure within the environment.  The people at the front desk were friendly and efficient.  I had no complaints during my stay and it was in an area with everything that I needed close by.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I truly appreciate your comments regarding your stay and how much you enjoyed your suite and our friendly staff. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: I have used this hotel on three different occasions for work. The staff is always welcoming and they go out of there way to make your stay pleasant. I had an email I needed printed and I was having trouble logging into the business center computer, immediately the staff offered to print my items. A real class act. They provide a full breakfast, my only compliant there is the guy that gives out food, he seems to give you more when you tip him, I didn't have a dollar or two on me so I got the bare minimum on a couple occasions. Other Best Westerns allow you go get your own food and I see no reason why I need to tip someone to give me bacon.  As for the rooms they are always clean and comfortable. TVs are nice 40"? LCDs and bedding is comfortable. Overall this hotel is a favorite
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay while here on business and that we were able to assist you in printing out the documents that you needed. In regards to the gratuity for the breakfast staff, I will share your comments with them so they are aware of their actions and correct it immediately. Thank you again for your review.  The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: Very good service and clean rooms. Internet problems. Overall great place to stay. Will stay here again.! Better than other best western hotels. Like the 2 rooms great for families. Good breakfast love it
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I truly appreciate your comments regarding your stay and how much you enjoyed your suite, complimentary breakfast, and our friendly staff. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: The room was large, cozy and inviting. I had a wonderful time while in the area, and was pleased to be in a nice neighborhood around with many restaurants, and entertainment.  The breakfast was great, a fully loaded hot breakfast.
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had a pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your comments. I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Check in was easy, Staff was very friendly and accommodating. No problem with late arrival. Bed super comfy. The room was a mini suite. Outside area had a TV, sofa and coffee table. Work desk but the chair should be replaced. The sink was located near the TV. Water pressure was a trickle but they knew about it and are in the process of remedying the problem. The sliding door and windows were only single pane with gaps in the seal which didn't keep out traffic noise from the I-5. Strange room layout but seemed to work fine. I'm not picky. I would have a work area around the sink, which was the new style bowl above the counter top. Sink lighting is way to dim. I would replace it with a standard sink, vanity area with better lighting. There was a noisy group near me and of course
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  Please accept our apologies that the water pressure was not adequate during your stay, we have replaced the boiler and all rooms have full pressure and hot water.  Still, we are pleased to know that you found the suite to be comfortable and the staff friendly and accommodating .  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel. Good value for the money.
Summary: Nice accommodations near our family. It's also a short drive to the coast. Lots of restaurants and shopping nearby. It's convenient to have breakfast offered at the hotel. They have a good selection of food. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. It's great to hear that you took advantage of how close our hotel is to Irvine Spectrum and all the shopping and restaurants they have to offer and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary Heading: A Comfortable, well appointed Hotel in Lake Forest just minutes from the Irvine Spectrum
Summary: Stayed 2 nights in a King Suite.  The room was immaculate upon arrival and it got better from there.  Bed was wondrously comfortable!  Sitting room and desk great.  Was just minutes from my daughters hotel (way more expensive) at the Spectrum in Irvine.  Our room was bigger, more comfortable, and just wonderful.  Location was convenient to traveling to anything in the nearby Spectrum area.    The staff was extremely helpful, from check-in to check-out.  Everyone was so friendly.  Parking was convenient to elevator and free.     Can't say enough.  Will definitely stay there anytime we travel to Irvine California.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I truly appreciate your comments regarding your stay and how much you enjoyed your suite, complimentary breakfast, and our friendly staff.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: BEST OF THE BEST WESTERN HOTEL
Summary: Quiet, breakfast excellent with lots of  choices but can add fresh fruits my family love their stay and we will come back at this place again if we will visit Disney and Universal Studio next time. Disney is nearby but not Universal, good if you will use John Wayne airport, Lot's of restaurants to eat during dinner time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. It's great to hear that you enjoyed the accommodations, all the amenities our suites have to offer, and saved your pocketbook from having to pay the additional Disney area resort fees. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Fantastic value with just what you need to be comfortable
Summary: This hotel is near restaurants, bars and other shopping areas so you don't have to drive if you don't want to.  Very convenient if you would like to relax with a beer without having to worry about driving.  Lots of covered parking and easy access.  Free breakfast was fantastic and their turkey bacon was excellent!
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had a pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your comments. I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: I was in Los Angeles California for business and I needed a place to stay for the weekend, not workng until Monday. After reviewing several hotels the Best Western Plus in Irvine California seem like the best option the receptionist at the front desk allowed me to check in early and also have an extended stay, Sunday. Their breakfast was great, scrambled eggs sausage, bacon, hash browns, waffles with lots of bread. They had a chef preparing the food for the buffet. The rooms were very clean, spacious, well appointed and had good lighting especially liked the the desk and table, mini fridge, and microwave. The staff was so very kind and helpful. Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to enjoy our hot breakfast buffet. Thank you again for your kind words.  The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: It was nice until we found out that someone next to are room had died, for what reason no one at the front desk would say, we had police walking around going in and out of the room next to us and no one would say a thing.  That made me nervous and got the wife upset.  So I had no idea if it was a murder, suicide or overdose.  I felt uncomfortable that someone died in the room next door and no one said anything...So I'm not very happy with the Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel in Lake Forest, CA.  So with that said I would not recommend this Hotel to anyone....
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you and your wife.  We did have a guest with a serious medical emergency which required the presence of emergency personnel.   I sincerely appreciate your concern.  However our privacy policy dictates we not discuss our guest’s personal information with outside parties.  The well-being of our guests is our top priority.  Emergency personnel deemed at no time were any of our guests in harm’s way, so there was no need to draw attention or alert other guests to the situation. We appreciate you providing us with your feedback and we hope that you will give us the opportunity to exceed your expectations the next time you're in the area.

Summary: The only word we can say is "EXCELLENT" The room, gym, food and last but not least the staff especially the night manager were the GREATEST!!! If or when we decide to take a vacation, there's the hotel we will stay in.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting such a remarkable review of our hotel, staff and amenities. I am thrilled to share your comments with my staff and let them know that all their efforts are being recognized. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Our overall stay was good but on a daily basis, we had issues with the hot water in the shower. The temperature was either too cold or too hot with little ability to control it. The room was large and clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is in an excellent location in South Orange County.  Easy access to the freeway.  Very close to many food choices.  Irvine Spectrum and the El Toro Mall are only a couple miles away.  The hotel also has lots of parking too. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had a pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your comments. I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Was looking for a place to stay for a business trip and saw a special price offer, was skeptical about the place because the offer was so good, and was then very pleasantly surprised, great location for business in Irvine, great room and staff, full breakfast with Chef and assistant in attendance, great wireless connection, will be staying here regularly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I'm thrilled that we were able to exceed your expectations of our hotel with our location, staff, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Ok so we booked the hotel thru Expedia had about 9 rooms we are a youth soccer team that has done this type of travel a few times, we have booked several other properties and have a decent understanding. The BW Plus Irvine Spectrum has been a really good choice for us. Not only did we get a competitive price but for the price we paid we got all the amenities a group like our self needs 2 double beds and 1 sofa bed in all rooms we booked, complementary Wifi, free parking, complementary hot breakfast that includes eggs, sausage bacon, hash browns, and self made waffles good waffles. Provided us with late check out at no cost, the rooms are clean and spacious and all the staff we encounter where great.  Things we felt could be better at breakfast have more people cooking the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate you letting us know that breakfast took a little long to get through the line.  Unfortunately, we were not aware that we would have a team staying with us, as all the reservations were booked individually through a third party site. When we have large groups or teams stay with us we always have additional staff on hand to help accommodate the guests. If you find that your soccer team will be in the area again, please contact the hotel directly and we will be happy to offer group discounts. Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary: I stayed here with my kids and we enjoyed this hotel. The Complimentary breakfast is awesome and my son who has food allergies was also able to eat breakfast here.  I am overall very happy with hotel and will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I'm so pleased to hear that you found our breakfast to have a wide variety of options that met your sons's needs.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Awesome hotel .... really liked the ambiance .... really nice employees all around .... great breakfast, everything was nice and fresh and the cook took a lot of pride in serving up breakfast!!! Nice people in the breakfast room, very accommodating ...... thank you!!!!
Manager Response: The staff and I read your review, and would like to thank you for writing such favorable things about our staff, facility and our complimentary hot breakfast. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Best value I ever have with Best Western
