Summary: Best Western has always been my first choice of accommodation for more than 25 years. This hotel is the best one I ever have. The breakfast is good with a chef taking an order. Room is combatable and spacious.
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had a pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your comments. I'm so pleased to hear that you consider our hotel the "best one ever" we are truly honored. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast. Thank you again for your kind words. The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: We had a great time.  The rooms were nice with 2 tvs and fridge. The breakfast was amazing. Very friendly staff. The hotel is a little out of the way but worth the drive. We always look for hotels that don't charge parking!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I'm so pleased to hear that you had a great time during your stay and that you found the accommodations, amenities and staff amazing.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good Rooms but need better Sofa Bed.
Summary: The property is clean and the staff at the front desk are very helpful. We checked in after 11PM and a gentlemen checked us in and he was very helpful. The room is clean and the beds are comfortable. The only thing that needs to be improve is the sofa bed in the living area. The foam is very thin and it's not comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We appreciate you letting us know that the sofa sleepers are not comfortable.  We are sorry for this issue, but are happy to let you know that we are in the process of replacing all of them, so we will be able to provide you with a more comfortable stay in the future.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: The room we had was nice and unexpected to included a living room area, separated from the sleeping area. very comfortable and quiet area.  Wifi was not always working ... appeared most of the time, only receiving a connection when we we out away from the property.  Daily breakfast was disappointing.  Toaster was not working. Scrambled eggs every morning were watery, hash browns were bland .. The workers appeared to be afraid, to even give you anything to eat.  Could have been better tasting and better served as a buffet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that you were disappointed with the breakfast.  I discussed your comments with the team, and we are making changes to the way items are prepared and served.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: BEST Best Western near the beach!
Summary: Used this hotel for a University Oceanography Field Course.  3 nights with 13 rooms.  Great location to get to Laguna Beach, Dana Point, and other nearby beach communities.  Excellent hot breakfast by Miguel.  Comfortable large double suites.  Highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I truly appreciate your comments regarding the accommodations and the complimentary hot breakfast.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: It was a lovely stay that was ideally located to my work. Easy access to everything I needed Even close to the ocean for a great day trip on my day off good restaurants everywhere and upscale shopping
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  It's great to hear that you took advantage of how close our hotel is to Irvine Spectrum and all the shopping and restaurants they have to offer. Thank you again for your review.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: Great location, clean room, great staff.  Taking these surveys is the worst part of the stay.  Not very pleased with having to write a 200 word essay. Can't get out of this section even when is says Skip this part.  This could make me think twice about stayong sat this location again.  Writing sa 200 worrd essay doeas not take a minute to complete.  Again this is crazy.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, the staff and the accommodations. I know that writing a review or "essay" takes time from your day, but my staff and I appreciate you taking the time to do so.  Thank you again for sharing your comments with us.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Room was even Better than Expected
Summary: Huge Room, Great Staff.  Perfect experience from reservation to check-out.  when I arrived, my room wasn't quite ready.  After traveling all day, I was hungry and decided to grab a bite.  When I got back, I had been upgraded and was put into a very large suite!  WOW
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  I'm glad that you enjoyed the upgraded suite and that the staff provided a perfect experience for you. Thank you again for your review. It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

Summary: This hotel offers great value for the price. If you want a hotel with easy access to Lake Forest, Laguna Beach, Irvine, Mission Viejo, this is the place to stay. The hotel is very close to Irvine Spectrum and easy access to freeway Interstate 5. The rooms are nice and have all you need. The staff is friendly and the breakfasts are good.
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had a pleasant stay with us.  Thank you for your comments.  I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: The room was pleasant. Internet and TV quality was passable but not excellent. Breakfast variety was standard but prepared as you watched. The facility is well maintained but age is starting to show in the furnishings.
Manager Response: My staff and I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your stay. We are glad to hear that your stay was enjoyable and we hope to see you again next time your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Everything was great except the wifi.  Could not get a strong enough signal to get any work done.  I was however, in the top floor in the corner of the hotel, that may be the reason.  The room however was great!  It had a spiral staircase going to second bed!  The breakfast in the morning completely surprised me!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  Please accept our apologies for the issues you experienced with the WiFi, I will have my maintenance staff check the access points to verify they are working properly. I truly appreciate your comments regarding the accommodations and the amenities.  Thank you again for sharing your comments with us.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Not as clean as it might appear
Summary: Spent one night here with family but cannot recommend. Sleeping on the sofa bed was like sleeping on a bed of springs. More concerning, the bottom of the sofa bed mattress was absolutely filthy. En route to the breakfast room in the morning, we came across a pillow outside that was soiled with upchuck. Not too appetizing. The pool was not heated sufficiently.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that the sofa sleeper was in poor condition and that there was an unappetizing site on your route to breakfast .  To prevent this from happening again, my team is walking the property throughout the day and removing any debris or objects that do not belong. We are also in the process of replacing all the sofas and chairs in the guest rooms.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Trying to find a hotel in California that is close to affordable is difficult at best. I'm used to traveling for business, and staying at Hilton, Marriott, Hyatt. I wasn't sure what to expect from a Best Western.  The last time I stayed at one was when I was 10 traveling with my parents from Michigan to Florida.   I have to say I was very pleasantly surprised.  I am traveling with my wife and two daughters, 17 and 20.  The area is very nice, the parking was plentiful and free.  The lobby is nice, not huge, but nice.   The desk staff was friendly.  The room was a two queen room, the unexpected part was that there was an extra sitting room with a closable door.  The bathroom was clean and updated.  The breakfast was included, and offered both hot and cold choices.  Acceptable
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I'm so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: I love this hotel because it's like a suite with a separate living room and bedroom.  There's a tv in the living room and bedroom so if someone wants to watch a different channel they can.  The only thing to know is to request a "quiet" room because the hotel is near a freeway and the freeway noise can be loud.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am glad to read that you were pleased with the size and layout of the suites. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.  We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary Heading: Not one of the best BW hotels
Summary: This hotel is okay but, as others have stated, it needs a general upgrade.  Front desk was helpful.  There was a very classy, different "sink" but there was no stopper to allow water to accumulate therein.  I liked that there was good hot water, which is not always the case in hotels.  TP was only one-ply, which was disappointing for a BW hotel.  A good thing is that the hotel is away from busy streets and freeways.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am glad to read that you were pleased with the suite and the hot water. I will make sure that the housekeeping staff is checking for sink stoppers and replacing any missing ones. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.  We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: But old building and old furniture. They do keep the property clean and it does offer good value...but it is not 4*. A solid 3*. Has an outdoor pool and Jacuzzi ...good parking...spacious room with old furniture but updated shower.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am glad to read that you were pleased with the accommodations and hot breakfast. We are in the process of updating the furniture and carpet in the rooms and also our walkways. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.  We would love to show you our progess, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: Great sized rooms--with suites even! Great breakfast, pool and hot tub.  But the carpets desperately need to be replaced in the rooms. Make sure they've been replaced before you stay in a particular room.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that the carpet in your room was in poor condition.  In response to your feedback, we are in the process of replacing all the carpets in the suites along with the furniture.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary: The layout is interesting. I don't like that the hotel is outside and not inside and for a plus I assumed it would be enclosed.  The rooms are beyond spacious! It's really decent with a refrigerator and mocrowave. There are vending and ice machines.  Close to several restaurants that you can walk to.  Complimentary breakfast is served.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Big Size room with easy access road
Summary: This hotel is located at the side of a freeway, so it's easily accessible to public road. However, the hotel can hardly be seen from the road. The parking area is very wide, and access to the room can be done via several alternative. So the hotel offer a lot privacy.  The room is quite big size, there are 2 big separate bed plus one living room with 2 LED television sets. I guess 4 people can stay in this room comfortably. The only note is the carpet on the floor, which I think make my foot dusty.  The other problem that I have is the breakfast, as for my 6 days stay, the menu never change. There are no other choice available at surroundings during the breakfast time, the only one is McD drive through (only) which is located 2 blocks from hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very comfortable stay with good amenities and professional staff. The hotel is close to I-405 on/off exits, restaurants and fast food places. Shopping is nearby, the Mission Viejo mall. Ample parking and well lit at night.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Bad Experience at Best Western - Irvine Spectrum in Lake Forest
Summary: Have stayed at a few Best Western Hotels in the past which were O.K., and decided to book with this hotel for a four night stay and was very disappointed with the quality of the room and the noise.  Upon entering the room there was an old damp smell and which did not go away.  The bed pillows had a strong odor and made for a bad nights sleep.  My wife took bath towels and covered up the  pillows but the smell was still there.  In the room next door  the talked on the back balcony until midnight and were smoking which we could smell.  The straw that broke the camels  back was while taking a shower the next morning the tub was filling up with water and would not drain.  I called the Hampton Inn and space was available then checked out of this Best Western Hotel.  Would not
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with details about your stay.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that you were not satisfied with the room and that the tub would not drain properly.  To prevent this from happening again, I will check with housekeeping and verify that the proper cleaning products are being used when servicing a room and instruct them to notify the maintenance staff if tubs are not draining properly. As for the noise from the surrounding guests,  if the front desk was notified my expectation is that they address the issue immediately. If they were aware and did not respond, I apologize.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary: We booked 2 queen beds and when we arrived they didn't have the room.  But they gave us a room with king bed + broken pull out sofa.  Very uncomfortable to sleep in. That was the only room they had. We couldn't leave it was very late a the kids were tired.  I expect a lot more for what we paid and from Best Western.  That's why we booked with them-- "for comfort"
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Best Western Plus
Summary: Very good stay in a nice neighborhood with a dog.  We stayed in a pet room. It is great that this brand accommodates dogs and let's you leave them in the room as long as they are in their carrier, so you can go out to dinner.  A very clean place, the pool was sparkling, they have a small self-serve laundry facility and we heard no noise from the neighbors, next door.   Also, the comfort of the beds were excellent!  Parking is free.  Non-smoking property.  Very affordable. Location right near the I-5 Fwy and Lake Forest exit.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am glad to read that you and your pet were pleased with the accommodations and the amenities provided.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: More like a Best Western than a Best Western Plus
Summary: Had problems with AC and noise. Don't get a room over the parking garage entrance.  Noise was solved by a room move, but AC was the same in both rooms. Location is a little odd, with some vacant buildings around the hotel.  A GREAT Italian restaurant is within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with details about your stay.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that the air conditioner was noisy and you had to switch rooms.  To prevent this from happening again, my team is servicing all the air conditioning units to try to make them as quiet as possible.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: Would be great if the service was better
Summary: Although the appearance of the hotel was acceptable and would have been a delightful stay, the service my family received was unacceptable.  The sheets had not been cleaned on one of our beds and the process to receive new sheets was unbelievable!  Upon informing the front desk staff of the unclean sheets we were told that they were unwilling to bring new sheets to our room and that we would have to come down to the front desk in order to receive clean sheets.  After walking down to the front desk, I was then told that they did not have any clean sheets and would have to go to housekeeping to locate sheets and covers for our room.  A few moments later I received a phone call stating the front desk clerk was unable to get into the housekeeping room and was therefore unable to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to inform me of your stay. I am shocked and embarrassed that this incident took place. It is completely unacceptable that you were checked into a room that had unclean sheets and then were told that no clean sheets were available. This is not the type of service that we provide and this will be addressed immediately. I apologize that you had to experience this during your stay and can assure you that this will never happen again. We appreciate your business and would like the opportunity to make it right for you the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: We liked the 2-room suite layout of all the rooms.  2 dbl beds and TV next room sofa bed and armchair and TV, fridge and microwave. Good hot breakfast. Good A/C.  Little over $100/night plus exorbitant local tourist tax.  Close to Disney land and beaches.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  It's great to hear that you enjoyed the accommodations, all the amenities our suites have to offer, and saved your pocketbook from having to pay the additional Disney area resort fees.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: This was the third time we have stayed at this same hotel.  The service is great, it is clean, and in a safe area, and is close to everything.  We used the pool and had the breakfast, we total love this place.  I arrived early to check in and our room was not yet ready the clerk took my phone and called me as soon as it was ready, great service.  We also requested a late check out, and they gave us that as well.  This is the third time we have chosen to stay at this same hotel and each time we have been very pleased.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patronage and  taking the time to share your experience. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities. The staff and I appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: best breakfast at any BW we have ever stayed!
Summary: We enjoyed the fresh sight seen, breakfast prepared out front.  Liked the options.  Hard boiled eggs would have been a nice touch and perhaps brown sugar for oatmeal.  But other than that, it was quick, hot and met our needs, plus very clean and friendly staff.  Room was spacious, clean.  Bed mattresses and sofa bed mattress both need renewing to something less squishy and more support.  Lots of space.
Manager Response: It is so rewarding to read that you had an enjoyable experience during your stay with us.  Thank you for your comments.  I am proud of our team for meeting your needs and providing friendly service throughout your stay.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: I didn't enjoy staying there at all. The hashbrowns were burnt everyday for breakfast. They need to have more than 1 waffle maker. The carpet and furniture in the hotel was dirty. The people at the front desk were nice but they need to clean the rooms better.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with details about your stay.  Please know that we are sincerely sorry that you were not satisfied with the breakfast and that the rooms were not satisfactory.  To prevent this from happening again, we are currently in the process of replacing the carpets an sofas in all the rooms and my breakfast team will pay closer attention to the items on the grill to prevent them from burning. We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.    We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

Summary: We stayed in a room with two queen bed and an additional sofa bed. The room itself was quite comfortable. But there are some quirks hence the low rating.  One queen bed was so much against the wall that it was difficult to access it.   The quality of the Soap and toilet paper was very very poor. It seemed like a 1⭐️ motel. (Totally not suitable for the $170 price we paid).  All rooms were on the 2nd or 3rd floor or 4th with a very slow elevator to access it. The stairs were also very strange. you climb from 1st to 2nd and the stairs from 2nd to 3rd floor are completely hidden without any signs.   Breakfast was fairly decent.  Most probably will not stay here again. Disappointed with the quality of this one.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel, nice rooms. Balconies, large suites..and pretty quite. Front desk got us an early check in quick..VERY PLEASED with this place..I will definitely stay here again. Also plenty of shops and restaurants near by..I heard Sammy's Original was the restaurant to go to..looks packed..thus good food
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am glad to read that you were pleased with the location, the accommodations and the staff.  Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.  We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary Heading: Beautiful rooms, amazingly comfortable beds, nice breakfast!!
Summary: This is a well-designed property.  The rooms are really quite beautiful and spacious.  The beds were supremely comfortable, and for breakfast, they had someone cooking everything fresh right there and serving it up.  This could make the line a little slow, but it was worth it.  We were there to visit the beaches, so this wasn't the closest property, but I would do it again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay. The staff and I are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hot breakfast, and found the bed and rooms to be comfortable. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I called ahead to request a ground floor room.  They don't have any, but I wasn' told this!!!  I have dogs, so this was a serious inonvenience.  Especially since they put us on the third floor.  One of my dogs was terrified of the elevator.  Breakfast was crummy.  A guy cooks bland, scrambled eggs...and fake bacon. I paid $188...what a rip -off!!!  That's with a discount!!!  Maybe they can get rid of the huge carpet stain...that was there upon arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay, I apologize that you were not properly informed of the property set-up and the location of the rooms. It is our goal to honor all guest requests whenever possible and unfortunately we were not able to due to the layout of the building. I will speak with my staff to ensure that they are more informative regarding the location of specific rooms and offer an alternative route to rooms to avoid using elevators. I appreciate your feedback and will use it as a training tool for the staff.

Summary: Showed up late due to length of travel. When we arrived our family was upgraded to a Suite with Loft (no extra charge)  Great extra space and privacy for us and our older son. Breakfast was cooked to order buffet style plenty of items on the menu as well as fresh fruit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are delighted to hear that you were happy with your room and the additional privacy that it provided for your family. It is nice to know that you enjoyed our breakfast options and that the variety was to your liking. We look forward to having you stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: AC not working...88 degrees the 1st night
Summary: Other than the fact that the AC wasn't working the 1st night and the room was 88 degrees AND that the 11 pm shift worker was extremely rude when I kindly and patiently asked if there was any other rooms available, The stay was fine.  I was not upset when I talked to him, but he went defensive and rude immediately and that is what frustrated me.  I realized there wasn't much anyone could do at 11 pm on a Friday night to fix and AC, but I did want some attempt at a solution of how we could get some sleep.  Eventually he offered to bring up a fan "when I have time", but I pushed to wait for him as we were past wanting to get some sleep.  Everyone else at the hotel was friendly and helpful.  The hot breakfast (made in front of you by a chef), was a pleasant and wonderful surprise.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I would like to apologize for the manner in which the associate dealt with the A/C not working in your room. It is my expectation of my staff to be helpful and friendly and address every issue immediately, as stated we truly dropped the ball. I will address this incident with the associate and make sure that it does not happen again. I am happy to hear that other than this one incident that you were able to enjoy the remainder of your stay. We appreciate you choosing Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Some of my shopping items were taken from the room and hotel staff reacted recklessly upon reporting the problem. The bathroom door was broken also. Managers and front desk staff extremely careless and they didn't help with the problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I apologize that items were missing from your room and that you didn't feel that the steps taken in investigating the incident were sufficient. I have spoken to my staff and I can assure you that every effort was made in trying to locate the missing items.  We take this matter very seriously and take action accordingly. We appreciate your patronage and hope you will stay with us next time you are in the area.

Summary: Good breakfast . Friendly staff . Nice comfy rooms for the price point . AC worked very well . Loved the Orange water in the lobby . We had a pleasant stay . Im just typing this to meet the 200 letter min .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. My staff and I are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast, the comfortable room and found the staff to be helpful and friendly. We look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary Heading: A clean, modern, well appointed hotel
Summary: This Best Western Plus is a modern and well appointed place that's conveniently located near the 5 and 405 fwy's and pretty close to both the Irvine Spectrum and Irvine Meadows Ampitheater. Most rooms feature several nice features, most prominently a separate bedroom and "living area" great if someone wants to rest but others want to stay up. Another feature are in-room safes which I always appreciate when I travel.  This hotel has an excellent breakfast with a large breakfast room and a cook on duty to make sure all your hot items are fresh. A great selection of cold items as well. We were super lucky to get a random upgrade and ended up in one of the multi room (suites). More of a loft that could have easily slept 5 or 6 total ( with a a sleeper sofa). Anyhow, it was quite
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay and are delighted to hear that you had a pleasant stay. It’s great that you were able to take advantage of our hot breakfast and all it has to offer, it is an incredible amenity especially for families. I am excited to share your comments with my staff that you found them to be friendly and helpful; they will be please to hear the positive feedback. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to having you stay with us the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: We only stayed one night - the staff was great, hotel was clean and bed comfy. The breakfast was a hot cooked breakfast. I would recommend it. We received a AAA discount so the price was right. It was perfect overnight stay for where we were headed.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your recommendation and are delighted to hear that you had a pleasant stay. The staff and I are delighted to hear that you found them to be friendly, the rooms to be comfortable and clean, and the breakfast hot and plentiful.  We look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary Heading: Good if passing by or one night stay
Summary: Booked a room at the last minute for 4th Juy weekend and had no problems. We were driving from Grand Canyon to Laguna Beach but laguna hotels were too pricie so we stayed at this one 20 minutes away with access to Walmart by Irvine and it worked out as far as location because we stocked up with items at Walmart and then headed to the beach. Staff was pleasant, we arrived late around 4 AM, I called to give them aheads up and had no problems, check in was a breeze. Suite rooms are roomy enough for about 5-6 ppl even have pocket doors for privacy (2 doube Queen beds on one side/1 sofa bed with desk TV and mini fridge on other side of pocket doors). Brekfast was good but lines were super long (7-10 AM) becuase cook prepares and serves food (hash potatoes, scramble eggs, sausage,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations and were please with our centralized location to local shopping and venues. The staff and I appreciate your feedback and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Stayed here for business with 4 of my associates, we all agreed, Friendly staff, nice clean rooms, comfortable beds, It was nice having a hot breakfast! I would definitely stay here again for business or pleasure!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I am happy to hear that you and your associates enjoyed our accommodations and amenities. The staff and I appreciate your feedback and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Stayed here while participating in USBC CA Women's State Tournament at Lake Forest Lanes. Liked the warm welcome by staff, the covered parking, clean lobby, spacious room with pocket door to separate the sleeping area from the living area, and hot breakfast items freshly prepared and variety of cereals and beverages. Shower head was good quality. Microwave and small refrigerator were helpful. Was disappointed with the icy-cold swimming pool and very lukewarm spa water, as well as barely-absorbent, scratchy pool towels. Exercise room HVAC system remained at 78 degrees despite repeated attempts to lower temp so room would be comfortable while exercising. Additionally, no full-length mirror in room, so applying makeup was difficult. Horizontal mirror was mounted behind large t.v.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to offer feedback on your stay with us. I’m delighted to hear that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and their amenities. I appreciate you letting us know about the issues with the pool and spa water temperature, as it turns out the heater was in need of being replaced. We had a new heater installed this week and the spa is at a nice warm 104 degrees.  I also had our maintenance staff check the A/C in the fitness room and due to the unit freezing up it was not able to cool the room efficiently. The unit has since been thawed and now the guests are able to work out in a cool, comfortable environment. We welcome and value your feedback as it helps us grow and make necessary improvements. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to show you the improvements we have made and to exceed your expectations the next time you travel to our area.

Summary: Large room with pocket door available to separate the sleeping area and bathroom from the living area. Very comfortable bed. No full-length or vanity mirror. Sink and television screen were situated in front of mirror, so was difficult to see to apply makeup.  Pool water very icy; spa lukewarm. Scratchy pool towels; hardly absorbent. HVAC in exercise room did not adequately cool the room. Hot breakfast items were prepared on site. Cold cereals and bread products were available, also.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay. It is good to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and the complimentary hot breakfast. We thank you for letting us know about the issues with the pool and spa water temperature, we had the heater replaced this week and now the temperature is much more enjoyable. We have also corrected the cooling issue in the fitness center. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to show you the improvements we have made and to exceed your expectations the next time you travel to our area.

Summary: This hotel is one of the worst hotels you could possible stay at it stinks and all its furniture in the rooms are stained and dirty. Needs a complete gut out . Don't be fooled by the great price and breakfast it is truly a nightmare to stay at. Most of there guests are construction workers so if you have a family this is defiantly not the environment you would want them in.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel. Clean spacious rooms. The staff is very helpful and pleasant. The breakfast has something for everyone and easily saves you $60 for a family of 4. they have cereal, yogurts, toast, muffins, waffle machine as well as a cook that prepares eggs, hash browns, bacon and sausage. This hotel is close to Irvine Spectrum for shopping and close to the Irvine Meadows Amphitheater so if your going to a concert this is the place to stay.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your recommendation and are delighted to hear that you and your family had a pleasant stay. It’s great that you were able to take advantage of our hot breakfast and all it has to offer, it is an incredible amenity especially for families. I am excited to share your comments with my staff that you found them to be friendly and helpful; they will be please to hear the positive feedback. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to having you stay with us the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: Needed a place to stay while working as an Election Inspector. Stayed here before to enjoy Sammy's Original without having to worry about a DUI. (they're REALLY strict in Lake Forest!) Stayed here for the Election and got to enjoy Sammy's as well. Good value. Good location.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are delighted to hear that you found us to be affordable, the location was convenient, and you enjoyed the local Sammy's restaurant. We hope to see again during the next election.

Summary: Very unsatisfied as I was told upon check in that I would be staying in a smoking designated room. I do not smoke and have allergies from smoke. I do not know of any other hotels that have hotel rooms designated "smoking". I travel quite a bit for work and this was a first. Terrible nights sleep as I had to breath the smoky air all night and it got into my clothes, etc.
Manager Response: I’m so sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay. I know that the perception in California is that it is a Non-Smoking state which is mostly true, however there are still some hotels within California that still offer smoking rooms (although fewer and fewer) and we happen to be one of them. Whenever we have guests that are booked into smoking rooms in error, we try to accommodate them and place them in a non-smoking room if we have it available. It seems that we must have been sold out of non-smoking rooms and therefore unable to switch your room. I do apologize that we were not able to make your stay more comfortable and that your allergies were aggravated due to the smoking room. If you are ever traveling in the area again please contact the hotel directly and we will book and confirm your room type to avoid this from happening again.

Summary Heading: Great value, comfort and outstanding breakfast!
Summary: Comfortable, clean, spacious room with modest decor.  The home-cooked breakfast is terrific. Secure location and surrounding neighborhood.  Good access to multiple coastal areas, < 30 minutes.  Staff is exceptionally helpful and nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities.  The staff and I appreciate your feedback and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Stayed here for an overnight visit. The staff was friendly and helpful.  The room was very spacious with the bedroom separate from the living room and it had a jacuzzi tub in the bedroom. There was also a coffee maker, small fridge and microwave. The bed was comfortable.  The complimentary breakfast was better than most. As a solo female traveler I felt very safe staying here. My only negative comment is that there was the smell of stale cigarette smoke when the air conditioner turned on and this was a no smoking room. I don't know if it was because it was on the top floor and a "corner" room but a fellow traveler stayed here the same night in a different room and did not notice any stale cigarette smell. I did bring this to the attention of the front desk as I did not want to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I’m excited to share with the staff that you found them to be friendly and helpful while enjoying our comfortable accommodations and complimentary hot breakfast. I appreciate you letting us know about the smoke smell that you encountered in the room, I will have our maintenance personnel replace the air filter in the air conditioner to see if that will correct the issue. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: We stayed 2 nights at the end of our trip here. Convenient location to the John Wayne/ orange county airport. About a 12 minute drive in the early morning on a Saturday. Rooms have exterior entrances and look to be updated and are suites with seperate living areas. Full breakfast was free with our room and was served by an on-site chef. Our stay was good. We had 2 concerns with the property. The shower was very hot and shower temperature was temperamental. Took some patience to get it set right. Also the main elevator in the lobby was a bit scary to ride in and made noises and jerked at times. Outside of that the rest of our stay was fine.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are delighted to hear that the location was convenient for early morning departure out of John Wayne Airport and that you were able to enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast. I’m sorry that you experienced issues with the water temperature; I hope that you mentioned this to our staff so that we could try to repair the problem with that shower. Although we have the elevator serviced monthly, I will have them come out and look into the noise and jerking that you have mentioned. Thank you for your comments and we look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: I booked 10 room for my bowling group.  As a hole everyone was very satisfied with the hotel except for the sink in the bedroom.  The hot breakfast was very good.  The location is quite good and with-in 15 minutes of the Orange County Airport.  If I have a complaint, it would be the effort needed to book and confirm my group.  It took several call to finally get a conformation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. It was a pleasure to host your bowling group and I’m pleased to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations and hot breakfast. I apologize that you experienced issues with the reservation process and that it was a challenge receiving confirmation. We are now able to offer all groups their own booking link, so that they are able to book their special group rate directly on our website. We hope that when your next tournament comes to town you will give us the chance to bowl you over with our book direct group link and exceed your expectations.

Summary: Great people work here, friendly, helpful, courteous!  Rooms are very comfortable and accommodating.  The breakfast is always hot and ready.  I am very satisfied with everything here, almost prefer this better than home.  LOL  You can't go wrong when you stay here.  John and his staff are extremely helpful and accommodating anytime we need something.  Thank you.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay. I am excited to share your comments with the staff. They will be happy to know that you enjoyed the accommodations and that John and the rest of the staff were friendly and helpful throughout your stay. We look forward to providing you with a home away from home the next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: The lobby area is very nice. The breakfast is the best I've experienced in a Best Western. They have a very nice guy who makes scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage and hash browns fresh, plus cereal, juice, toast, muffins, waffles, etc. Pool area is small, but nice. Bed was comfortable. Parking is very tight-- almost touching the car next to yours. I guess that's normal for southern California. The room and hallways were older and worn, but they were clean. Overall, a good experience at this Best Western. I would stay here again-- and probably will.
Manager Response: The staff and I appreciate you taking time to provide us with feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and our comfortable accommodations. Please note, we are currently in the process of updating the carpet and furnishings in the rooms to give them a more updated look and feel. We thank you for your review and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Staff was great and helpful. Pool needs to be cleaned, carpeting in room needs cleaning.  "balcony" had view of torn out parking lot next door.  Beds hard and left us achy every day, after tossing and turning all night. Furniture in Living room outdated.  Had trouble with Fridge freezing things and sink didn't drain for 2 days, they fixed things when requested.  Housekeepers left notes in door at 8:00 if they came by and we had do not disturb on door, we had to ask that they come back when we left so they could clean room. They should do check-outs first, then rooms for people staying longer.  We were looking forward to breakfast to save money during trip, but went only once because it was disappointing.  Not set up as "buffet", but one guy is cooking and serving too, by the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I’m happy to hear that the staff was friendly and helpful while assisting you during your stay. We are currently in the process of updating the carpet and furnishings in the room to give them a more updated look and feel.  As for the breakfast, I will work with the kitchen staff to try to provide a more efficient breakfast experience for all our guests. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to exceed your expectations the next time you are in the area.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: If you read my reviews you know I very rarely slam any hotel, but in the case of this place, the owners need to hear this loud and clear: this place is filled with tired, beat up, old rooms that are not being cleaned properly. I saw two different rooms and I couldn't spend more than a few minutes in each, they were that bad. The couches and other furnishings look like they'd been purchased during the Reagan administration, with stains and tears in the fabric that are ugly and embarrassing. I've been in far less expensive hotels that were better than this place. Sure, the rooms are very large (suites really) and the breakfast ample and the staff are nice, but nothing compensates for old, beat up, dented, stained, torn, ugly furniture and beds that sag and creak from overuse.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I would like to apologize that we were not able to meet your expectations and that the condition of your room was unsatisfactory. Please know that we are currently in the process of updating the carpet and furnishings in the room to give them a more updated look and feel. I’m happy to hear that the staff was friendly and accommodating while assisting you.   We appreciate your feedback and hope that you will give us the opportunity to exceed your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: If you can see this much filth on a chair, imagine what you can't see. The vacuum lines on the disgusting chair is equivalent to putting lipstick on a pig. Pass. The room is musty. The cleanliness is sketchy as you can see by the furnishings. You enter rooms from the outside. Definitely motel and not hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I would like to apologize that the condition of your room was less than satisfactory. We are currently in the process of updating the carpet and furnishings in the room to give them a more updated look and feel.  We appreciate your feedback and hope that you will give us the opportunity to exceed your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay BEST breakfast
Summary: This place has a GREAT hot breakfast that includes sausage, eggs, hashbrowns, waffles and juice.  it was a big hit with my kids.  The staff was friendly and kind. The rooms could use a little updating, but overall it was a very good value. Beds are comfortable and the mirrors are huge with plenty of room for a family of 5. The sink is outside the bathroom (it really doesn't matter) and the couch is a pull out bed. It was so nice to have an additional little room with a couch and TV.  That makes TWO televisions for one room. our kids loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience.  It is good to know that you and your family enjoyed our accommodations, amenities and friendly staff while visiting the area.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Good hotel, clean, nice location. Located near the Irvine Spectrum and Irvine Meadows Amphitheater. Room was clean but could use a little updating. Not a lot of amenities but for a short trip it was perfect. Thought it was a bit high priced for a Best Western but it is Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience. It is good to know that you enjoyed our accommodations, amenities and were able to take advantage of the local venues.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: My self and family enjoying staying at this location.  We get treated as if we were at home.  The staff always go a bit further in making sure my family enjoys their stay.  I always try to stay here when I'm in the lake forest area.  The surroundings are calm and very nice.  The pond right down the streets is a nice brisk walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience. It is good to know that you and your family enjoyed our accommodations, amenities and friendly staff while visiting the area. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to being your home away from home the next time you are in the area.

Summary: The hotel was clean and rooms were large.  Staff in general were helpful and kind. Michelle saved the day, great customer service.  Hotel is conveniently located and property is kepted very clean.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: The staff and I appreciate you taking time to provide us with feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations, amenities and friendly staff while visiting the area. I am pleased that Michelle was able to assist you during your stay, I will be sure to share your comments with her. We thank you for your review and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: I have stayed at Best Western in a number of states and this one is the best so far. Big and clean rooms, great breakfast for free and quite rooms. The only thing is the bathroom sink is in the bedroom and not the bathroom - a bit awkward.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities. Due to the way the property was constructed the location of the sink is unusual, it is what makes our rooms unique. The staff and I appreciate your feedback and look forward to exceeding your expectations the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Place was a little hard to find with car gps.  Had to circle around twice.  Called for extra towel.  Waited a whole hour.  No towels.  Called again front desk asked if I ever got my towels, told her I wait an hour, said the person that was to had brought them already left and I'd had to go get them myself.  Could of told me that so I didn't have to wait and wasted my time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I apologize that your request was not taken care of promptly and that you were left waiting. My expectation is for my staff to respond to any and all requests in a quick, friendly manner. If they are unable to respond immediately to the request, they must contact the guest to inform them of the delay. I will work with the staff to become more efficient in their communication. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to improve your experience the next time you travel to the area.  We appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Nice Modern up to date room in older property
Summary: Older property with up to date room.  Nice linens, free internet works well.  Slow elevator.  Nice pool.  Convenient to shopping, restaurants.  Around 15 minutes to John Wayne airport.  HD flat screen TV with standard def analog reception.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You think you're staying in a nonsmoking room, but clearly the room has experienced smokers. The address is wrong! It takes you on a right turn from "boeing" drive when it actually is a left. The lack of windows makes you feel like you're in a motel as opposed to a hotel :(
Manager Response: none

Summary: clean, friendly and affordable! Location was close to nearby attractions and shopping. a few exits away from the Irvine spectrum with movie theatre, dining, excellent shopping, etc. I def. recommend this hotel for the price and comfort. The beds were very comfy and pillows were like sleeping on air.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second stay at this hotel.  It is at a great location next to the Irvin Spectrum Mall and close fairly close to the UCI campus. It has been a great place for our family to stay and relax while visiting my daughter that goes to the University of California Irvine.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great complimentary breakfast and dog friendly
Summary: When we checked in, registration was quick and person very friendly.  Room was very nice and we were able to bring our dog.  Breakfast each morning was hot and tasty.  Their cook has been there for over 20 years and friendly too.  Will definitely be back
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed 4 nights at this hotel in February and I was horrified: the carpet in my room was stained and my room had a horrible smell. The sofa and the whole furniture was in terrible condition. The linen were visibly not ironed - at least. The breakfast room also had all chairs stained and old, and the offer of food was very limited. Staff is unfriendly and not professional. This place is definitely not worth 110$/night.  We were 5 people from my company and we are issuing a complaint with the agency so that nobody from our staff will stay again here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We come to this area about once a month for business. We have tried several hotels but will now just book the best western. It's comfortable, clean, the staff is nice, has a pool, And a breakfast.   The rooms have a sitting area And a bedroom area both areas have tvs. It is fairly renovated. The weird part is the sink is outside of the bathroom but that's okay. They also have fridges and microwaves.  We tried the pool but it is not heated and unbearably cold. The hot tub is hot, hot. Too hot when the sun is shining but perfect at 9 pm.  We booked this last minute president's day weekend and we were lucky to get a room. We got there a bit early and they let us check right in.   The area is perfect for lots of restaurants. We drove next exit down and found a Walmart to get some
Manager Response: none

Summary: We received excellent service on our brief stay with extended family after returning from a cruise to Mexico. The pool and spa were very much needed and appreciated. Very good area restaurants and a good hot meal included for breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice Staff, Dated Hotel, Sketchy People Hanging Out in the Lobby
Summary: My husband and I spent one night here, while attending to business in the area.   The front desk staff was very friendly and worked hard to make sure that we were happy. They allowed us to check-in early.  We had a room on the third floor at the end of the hall. We did hear noise above us, but it wasn't too bad. The room was very large, with a separate sitting area- nice to have, especially as we were working in the room. It looks like they've tried to keep the area updated with newish furniture, but it still feels old and a bit shabby.   What would keep us from staying here again, is the sketchy people that always seemed to be hanging out in the lobby. I'm not sure if they were actually staying at the hotel, but they made us feel uncomfortable. It was the same with the car
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the level of professionalism of all the staff. Every one was friendly, helpful, and provided 5-star service. The entire week was hassle-free, every detail was handled, and I felt welcomed. I will definitely stay here again the next time I am on town.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: good value, convenient location and room access
Summary: This hotel offers spacious suites with views of the central courtyard. We had a suite with a king bed and separate living room with pull-out sofa. There were 2 TVs so this would also be a good choice for families with children.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Here due to death in the family
Summary: Very kind, professional and accommodating staff. Impressive! Clean environment. Passed on the so-so breakfast. Very close to 5 freeway so noisy outside, but room was reasonably quiet with the door shut.
Manager Response: none

Summary: an extremely friendly, family , safe feeling etc hotel. exceptionally friendly staff. if our adventures take us to that area again we'd definitely stay at this same hotel. extremely comfortable. great breakfast too
Manager Response: none

Summary: Really large 2 queen room with outer room that had a sitting area, fridge and microwave. Seemed clean enough. Good room for the price. Breakfast was well stocked with the usual carb heavy fare. Ample parking. Had a balcony looking out to another office building.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights with 3 kids while visiting area attractions. The room is as others have posted nicely appointed but the bathroom sink is embedded in the bedroom dresser/console unit directly in front of the bed which is plain weird. Our room had a fully enclosed balcony that faced an office building (enclosed by a 6' cement wall) and no patio chairs. The patio door was unlocked when we checked in. Glad I checked it. Aside from that I was really impressed with the space in the room. Our room had a separate sitting area and pocket door to separate the sitting area from the bedroom and a tv in both rooms which was nice. Full hot breakfast on the weekend was nice but on Monday it was unappealing and made me sick. The hot tub was nice but the pool is unheated and too cold to
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve. It will be our pleasure to welcome you once again during your next trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay at a reasonable price.
Summary: Except for an issue with sporadic phone ringing, very comfortable room, very good breakfast. Staff was pleasant, and ck in/ck out were painless. I would definitely return, and recommend it to our friends.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve. I do apologize for the issue with the telephone in your room. This was passed onto our phone technician and the issue has been corrected.

Summary Heading: Well situated mid-priced hotel off I-5
Summary: The BW Irvine is well situated just off the 1-5/I405 split near El Toro road, close to multiple restaurants and lots of shops.  It has nice facilities, a good-value breakfast, and excellent wi-fi connections in the rooms.  The pool is situated in the center of the hotel.  This is a PLUS brand of Best Western and it meets all the standards. We had a corner room/suite, which was comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve.

Summary: This place was wonderful. The room was huge with two TV's and two rooms. My only two gripes are that the bathroom did not have a fan so when someone showered you had to open the window or be suffocated by the moisture in the air and the sheets did not have corners, they were just flat sheets so by the middle of the night I was sleeping on the mattress *shudder*.   The staff was friendly and helpful and the breakfast was fantastic. They actually had a cook serving you eggs, hash browns and sausage. The waffle mix was out and I had asked for more and so had another kid shortly after I had asked and it didn't get filled until about 20 minutes later, was glad I had moved on to something else. Close to a lot of attractions. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights stayed in smoking room, we know they are usually not as nice but the coach in this room was nasty, we were actually afraid to sit on it. Everything else about the room was pretty nice, they jut need to get a new coach and chair the pics are of the stained gross couch, I would stay again but only if they get a new couch and chair
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your opinion about the quality of your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. Thank you as well for expressing your dissatisfaction with the couch and chair that was in your room. We are in the process of replacing all of our living room furniture. Please know that we take your comments seriously and are moving forward to correct these concerns for future guests. Our goal as a company is to ensure that as our guest you have a pleasant experience every time you stay with us. We do look forward to your return during your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Overall a very good stay, The room is so big, had a bedroom and also had a living room. Both had tvs. Very clean. Bed is hard and firm. Breakfast was very good. Worth staying and will consider for staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve.

Summary Heading: An honest review take what you need and leave the rest!
Summary: Pros- Clean room and property, nice breakfast with hot items but they do not change so they become boring after a few days, nice area, clean pool/Jacuzzi, free wifi worked pretty well. Cons- sink is inside room literally in same area as your bedroom television, parking is very tight spaces and limited so during peak times I'm sure you'd have trouble with parking although we did not, the staff is not very friendly but not rude they just do their job nothing more do not expect a smile or good morning, the balcony advertised is simple an area you can walk out onto that has 7 foot high concrete wall surrounding so it is somewhat private but has no view whatsoever so do expect to sit out here and have your morning coffee unless you'd like to feel like you're getting your hour of yard
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, we would like to apologize that we did not deliver on our promise to "Wow" you with our service. I will be speaking to my staff about their customer service and how to make our guests feel welcomed. We want to ensure that you will always find value in choosing our hotel and making your stay a pleasant one is a top priority to us. We appreciate the time you took to give us your feedback about our hotel. It will be our pleasure to welcome you once again during your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: good room, cleaning staff, not so good front desk
Summary: Room was spacious, a bed room and a living room, with a good size balcony. Everything was in working order and in good quality.  All lights worked, central heating very efficient. Cleaning people do a good job upkeeping the room, and linens were all fresh and clean. If I rated based on the room and the cleaning staff, I would have given 9 out of 10.  The problem is the front desk. They don't care.  Plus, the access to the back side of the hotel is unhindered, at night, young people gather, walking around, could not tell which room they were going when I asked so that I could hit the corresponding floor button in the elevator.  My suggestion is to stay the front side of the building for safety.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve. I will be looking into the items you mentioned about safety concerns. I want to ensure all of our guests that their safety is a top priority. I will also be addressing my front desk staff regarding customer service and taking care of our guests. Again, thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.

Summary: We stayed here because I was having LASIK surgery nearby. The room was cool and quiet. It had a separate living room with a sliding door which allowed me to sleep peacefully after surgery while my boyfriend could still watch television in the living room. We had breakfast both mornings we were there. It was delicious! Everyone was friendly and helpful. A really stressfree stay that helped with my recovery immensely. Also, close to fast food restaraunts which is a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. It's a pleasure to see that we were able to meet your expectations during your stay. Our staff works hard every day to ensure that our guests are always welcomed with warmth and our rooms are always clean, comfortable and pristine. Therefore, your feedback is valuable to us since it lets us know where we are doing well and where we need to improve.

Summary: For under $100 we had a large two room suite with two large flatscreen TV. But the bedroom had a groovy bowl sink on top of the counter right next to the TV, which was blocking much of the mirror. The artwork was hung sideways and the hanging ceiling fixtures were strangely only inches from the ceiling. The king bed had full sized sheets and our window faced the elevator door.   BUT it was a lot of space for the money and very convenient to the freeway and restaurants.
Manager Response: Again, we appreciate the time you took to give us your feedback. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   The entire Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel team is ready to be your warm, welcoming hosts during your time away from home.

Summary Heading: Fine for a quick, low budget stay
Summary: The location is convenient to the 5 freeway and offers a great central location to south OC. Because it is right next to the freeway, you will likely hear the freeway noise regardless of the room location. My room was on the side of the building farthest from the freeway, but I still heard the hum of the cars going by.   The rooms must have been renovated recently - the furniture and design appeared modern. I was actually impressed by the style of the room for a Best Western. I really liked having a suite with a separate living area and 2 TVs. I found it odd that the bathroom sink was placed next to the TV in the bedroom. The only issue I had with my room was the level of noise - I could hear everything and anything happening in the adjacent rooms. The walls are so thin that I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences during your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear we were able to meet most of your expectations such as the breakfast, the fitness center, access to loacal restaurants as well as easy access to your vehicle. I am terribly sorry to hear about the noise level from the freeway along with noise from near by rooms. Although, we can not control the noise level for the freeway we try our best to maintain the noise level of our guests in house. I hope you would consider coming back to visit us again during your next trip to Orange County and give us another opportunity to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary Heading: Does not measure up to AAA 3 diamond rating
Summary: The appearance of the hotel is old and not kept up.  The hallways have paint worn off, the carpets in the room look very dirty, the sofas look dirty, we had to spread a sheet on it before we sat down, the toilets have seen better days.  In our case they did not bother to make up our room one day.  The breakfast was okay.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to give your feedback from your recent stay with us. I do apologize that the hotel did not meet your expectations. We are currently undergoing some renovations at our property such as carpet, sofa beds. As well as the upcoming project to resurface the walkways. I would love to have you back during your next visit to Orange County to see the improvements that are taking place. I apologize that your room was not serviced one of the days you were here. I will have to look into that to find out what the issue was.  Again, I thank you for taking the time to give your feedback and as always for being a loyal Best Western Guest.

Summary: Lots of room for the whole family with separate living room and bedroom, 2 TV's, and a free breakfast is included.  Friendly staff. Easy access to/from freeway, close to restaurants and shopping. Close to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm.  Good value.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to give your feedback from your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you were pleased with the service and quality of the hotel. I will pass along the good comments to all of my staff.  Once again, I do appreciate your feedback and as always for being a loyal Best Western guest. We look forward to you staying with us during your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: An adequate/good hotel, especially if you have pets
Summary: Stayed here while on Thanksgiving vacation.  Traveled with our small dog, and this was the best value & closest to my parents house.  It's an older place...so don't expect 5-star amenities.  But, if you're traveling with a pet, it's a good hotel and good quality for the money.  The WiFi was adequate, and the free breakfast each morning was great (very good).  They had a pool & jacuzzi, but it was outdoors, and a cold front moved in, so we weren't able to use it.  Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts regarding your recent stay with us. We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to provide you with a superior service and look forward to you staying with us again, along with your dog, during your next trip to Orange County.   Thank you!

Summary: Other than the not cleaning the room everything was fine. Breakfast was good. Location is good. We went to Disneyland and it was 20 min away and south coast plaza is close by. Restaurants are close by. Easy access to freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feelings regarding your recent stay with us. We thank you for staying with us because we know you have many choices. I"m sorry to hear there was an issue with the housekeeping. This is a rear occurance and will be looked into right away. We look forward to your future stays the next time you are in Orange County.

Summary: Clean place and nice folks.  only did a one niter but would go back to this place again next time i am in the area.  The breakfast was nicer than most other BW breakfast with real bacon and sausage as well as real eggs cooked up.

I will share with all of them how pleased you were with your stay.  Again, thank you for staying with us! We look forward to your return the next time you are in Orange County.

Summary Heading: one of the best Best Western
Summary: spend three night at this location part of ten night stay at different BWs in southern California, by far this was a best location, there is nothing bad to say about this hotel, just want to thank staff for specially kitchen for treating us so good, this took us about 25 min drive to Disneyland

Summary: The room was like a suite.  The desk clerk, EMMA went beyond to assist with a place for us to have supper.  The breakfast the next morning was cooked as you waited, with excellent eggs, bacon, potatoes.  Coffee, juices and milk available with a large dining area.  We would highly recommend this Best Western Plus for your stay.

Summary: Nice business hotel. Internet was spotty, so tough to work. Breakfast opened when it wanted to open, and not at the posted 6:00 AM. Pool not heated, spa not working. Not what I usually get at a Best Western Plus.
Manager Response: The staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests have a superior experience. I thank you for sharing the concern with the breakfast start times. As you stated Breakfast does start at 6am during the week and 7am on the weekends. I apologize for any issues that may have caused, I will look into this immediately. You're correct the pool is not heated and I apologize if this was an issue with the use of the pool.  Our spa was down for a short time due to an unforeseen maintenace issue with the pump. This has been corrected and our spa is open for all guest to use. Again, I apologize about the WiFi internet access. This is also another concern that has been taken care. We have upgraded our entire WiFi internet service for the hotel.  We appreciate your business as well as your feedback on the stay. We look forward to accommodating you during your next trip to Orange County.  Again, thank you being a loyal guest!

Summary: We always stay at this hotel and are happy here.  Staff is friendly and rooms and hotel clean.  Breakfast is good but sometimes the food is served to you cold could use alittle improvement in that area otherwise great place for the price to stay
Manager Response: We are happy to hear about your enjoyable stays with us. The staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests have a superior experience.
