We appreciate your business and look forward to accommodating you during your next trip to Orange County.  Again, thank you being a loyal guest!

Summary: Breakfast was the same all week. No change. Internet was horrible. Could hear people above walking. Lobby cleaner and more presentable then the rooms. Stayed for 4 nights 5 days. Hotel was by itself. Pool was clean. Maid service was well. Elevator inspection was out of date by over a year. Expired 09/14.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us. I do apologize if the hotel did not meet your expectations but am thankful you shared your thoughts. It gives me an opportunity to pass along to staff and use some ot the information as a training opportunity. Yes, our complimentary breakfast is same every day with a choice of traditional continental breakfast items with the options of cold cereal, oatmeal, fruit, selection of breads including muffins and danish, waffles, juice and/or coffee. Plus a hot breakfast option consisting of eggs, hash browns, sausage and/or bacon. The consistant breakfast menu is customary in many hotels. However, I do apologize if the breakfast selection was not up to your expectations. Our internet service is currently being updated and will be complete within the next week. As far as the the elevator permit. We have been inspected and passed. Unfortunately we are awaiting the for the new permits to sent out from the State of California. This is something that is out of our control but will follow up on this matter. I am happy to hear you were pleased with pool, lobby and the housekeeping service. Once again, I do appreciate you taking the time to share your feelings regarding your recent stay with us.

Summary: This hotel is easy to get to, and welcoming when you walk in.  Room was a basic room, but everything was clean and in working order.  Breakfast was the best one I've had for a Southern Calif Hotel.  Plenty of Parking.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to give your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that we were able to meet your expectations and look forward to you staying with us again in the future.

Summary: It's hard to find an economical place to stay that's safe and not run-down in the LA/Orange County Area.  You usually pay a lot or get something quite unpleasant.  This place provides a reasonable compromise.  The hotel exterior appearance is nice and the rooms are large.  The AC works very well, and we know because it was unusually hot when we visited the area.  The wi-fi speed was horrendously slow - in need of a major upgrade.   The breakfast was complete and hearty.  The man serving was either very shy or just not in a good mood.  The couch in the room was in need of a steam cleaning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give your feedback from your recent stay withus. I really appreciate the comments mentioned. We will be upgrading our internet service as of 10/19/15 which will correct any WiFi issues. I also will be meeting with my housekeeping supervisor regarding the steam cleaning of the sofa the room. I will also be addressing my kitchen staff regarding the subjecct providing our guests with a superior service and experience.

The front desk staff wasn't very responsive to requests i called and asked for more of something and never recieved them. As soon as we opened the door, that musky, unpleasant hotel room smell hit us.  The set up of the rooms was nice, a flat screen in the living room with a desk chair and a couch. Summary Heading: Best Western Plus - pretty good value
Summary: We booked this hotel to be close to the Ocean County beach communities without spending the money on the beachfront hotels in this area - which are quite expensive.  We thought - based on the name of the hotel - that it was a bit closer to the Irvine Spectrum (the local mega-mall) - but it was a bit of a drive away.  Our room was a suite, with a couch, chair, and second TV in an adjoining room.  The bathroom sink was actually on the counter of the bedroom area, which was unique.  The tub was very deep - which made getting in and out of the shower a little cumbersome.  The room had a fridge, which was convenient.  The TVs were very slow to change channels - and the channel numbers didn't show up on the screen - so you never really knew which channel you were watching!  The

Summary Heading: Decent Mid Level Hotel, Quick access to 5 Freeway
Summary: Check in was completed very quickly and I was given a room on the 4th Floor. Upon entering my room I impressed with the separate lounge area with a Sofa and TV that I could relax in without having to be in my bed.  The bedroom was at the back of the room with two double beds and had a balcony out the back, though not much of a view.  The room was very clean and the bathroom was also very clean. It was also nice that the Bathtub was a lot deeper than the usual US ones so you could have a decent bath if you wanted.  The next morning I checked out the breakfast and was really impressed with the eggs, hash browns and there being a chef cooking there.  This hotel has quick access to the 5 freeway to go north or south and overall I really enjoyed my stay and would return.

Summary: Stayed here over Easter weekend, tucked away from traffic but close to all area freeways and several restaurants within walking distance, Thai, Italian, Chinese, American Steakhouse to name a few. Breakfast was made to order eggs, hash browns with sausage or bacon, blueberry waffles, pastries, bagels, cereals, fresh fruit, yogurt and strong coffee!  Plenty to eat, just can't take it out of area.  Rooms were clean, spacious, flat TV's comfortable bed and good spray in shower and it heated it right away.  Microwave and mini-frig with small coffeemaker in room.  Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.

Summary: Stayed here only one night but was impressed by the 2 room suite with two flat screen TVs, comfortable king bed, couch and granite counter in bedroom.  Also had a mini fridge, desk and chair, and functional wi-fi.  Breakfast menu for up to 2 guests per room includes eggs the way you like them, hash browns, 2 slices of bacon, plus waffles, cereal, yogurt, toast, bagels, fruit.  Unfortunately the syrup for me was inedible since it was loaded with high fructose corn syrup.  So I ate the blueberry waffles with only butter and they were very tasty---and to me plenty sweet since I normally pass on any sugar.  Check in was fast and easy and so was parking. Summary Heading: Comfortable, great value, safe, cute neighborhood
Summary: I was traveling alone with my 5 month old and a little nervous about it. My experience at the hotel made me feel so much better! The hotel was affordable, close to the freeway, with a nice continental breakfast and warm and friendly staff. The room had a sitting area separated by a pocket door so I could let the baby nap while I got some work done in the other half of the room. It was large enough that I could have fit my whole 5 person family in the one room comfortably without spending more! The hotel is close to the freeway, which was nice since I traveled around Orange County quite a bit this trip. Within walking distance of the hotel were a few restaurants and a bit further were a couple of parks I visited with the baby. I had a great time staying there!

Summary: I've stayed here twice recently while my kitchen is undergoing a remodel. The room(s) are nicely furnished, clean, and a good size: absolutely great and no complaints whatsoever. Both stays, the breakfast "structure" is a bit unusual and needs to be reworked.   Here's how it works: you give your a piece of paper with your room number/name to a guy behind the counter wearing a hairnet. While there are serving dishes filled with scrambled eggs, potatoes, and hash browns, he seems to be making eggs to order. The first time, I waited one-half hour for a small plate of scrambled eggs. Second visit: probably 15-20 minutes. My suggestion is to have the large covered serving dishes with prepared food ready to serve guests and do away with eggs to order. It's a Best Western, not a diner

I just stayed here for business and I will say that had I not been with a group of male co-workers, the other female and I would have checked out immediately.  The hotel is more like a motel due to the outside corridors, which made me feel unsafe.  To add to that feeling, there were homeless people sleeping in the abandoned lot next door and in the hotel garage area.  The room was clean enough, but because of the outdoor corridors, I had to have the drapes pulled, making the room dark and creepy!  Also make sure to get a non-smoking room.  My co-worker arrived late and was stuck in a smoking room - the stench hit you like a brick wall at the door.  Lastly, the odd girl working the front desk in the afternoon/evening was less than helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to answer our survey and giving us your opinion about the quality of your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. Thank you as well for expressing your dissatisfaction with the problems you experienced during your stay. Please know that we take your comments seriously and will take immediate steps to resolve the issues you mentioned. Our goal as a company is to ensure that as our guest you have a pleasant experience every time you stay with us.   Also, I would like to mention as of Jan. 1, 2015 we are under new management. As the General Manager I appreciate all guest concerns and comments, and are using them as a way to improve our standards for future stays.  I hope in the future you will return to give us the opportunity to provide the excellent customer service I pride myself in providing for all guests.

Summary Heading: Irvine Spectrum not near Irvine Spectrum Center mall
Summary: Stayed there based on name.  Having Irvine Spectrum in name I thought it was near Irvine Spectrum Center mall.  Hotel to mall required getting on freeway for shortest route.    Location to close to freeway and heard freeway noise (day and night) through the poor fitting aluminum window and sliding glass door.  TV viewing, not worth watching.  Staff says its being updated.  But the bed was best I've ever slept in!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the survey and give us your opinion about your recent stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. This is why it's titled Best Western Plus - Irvine Spectrum.  We appreciate the time you took to give us your feedback about our hotel. It will be our pleasure to welcome you once again during your next trip to Orange County. The entire Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel team is ready to be your warm, welcoming hosts during your time away from home. Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel - stay here for a great experience
Summary: We stayed here on a trip to a conference.  We had three rooms.  The staff was excellent.  The breakfast was the best I have had in a long time.  I would stay here again just for that.  The hotel was inexpensive compared to others in the area and it was well-located to get to everything.  We spent time at our conference and at the beach and it was close to the Santa Ana Airport.  Fabulous.
Manager Response: Dear geoff h,   Thank you very much for your kind words. Our staff and management take pride in knowing that we were able to make your conference trip a pleasant experience for your entire group. Our commitment is to provide each and every guest with our own brand of warm, positive service.   We are very proud of our cooked to order breakfast, and it makes us happy to know that you thoroughly enjoyed it. We are happy that you were able to enjoy our facilities and amenities as well, and that they were a great value for you. Please come back and visit us again soon. It will be our pleasure to make your next trip to Lake Forest, CA a memorable one.

Summary: I used this hotel one year ago as they were about to complete their renovation and then add the Best Western Plus brand. I stayed again this year and was very impressed by the quality of the rooms, the cleanliness of the hotel and the service of the staff. Also, they provide a hot-cooked breakfast and you can even order your eggs to order! They gave us an excellent rate for booking again in 2015 when I plan to return again.
Manager Response: Dear Glen W,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review about your stay at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum. We are very proud of our cooked to order breakfast and it makes us happy to know that you enjoyed it. It will be our pleasure to be your warm, gracious hosts on your 2015 trip to Lake Forest, CA.

Summary: The hotel looks in very good shape with a well lighted reception area.  An all suite hotel, I was given a large two room suite at the end of the hotel.  It was like a cave, the living room had one small window that was well recessed from the hallway.  All entrances are from walkway, no interior halls.  The room is clean and comfortable.  Going out  for a walk in the morning the walkways were dark, no lights.  Then went to breakfast, surprise, cooked to order eggs.  Pool looked good but I did not have time to use.  Many small restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear bbqmaster69,  Thank you very much for your feedback on your experience at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel. We do our best to provide all our guests with comfortable accommodations every day.   We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our facilities and amenities, especially our fresh hot breakfast, as it is our goal to ensure that all our guests have a pleasant experience every time they stay with us.  Please accept our apologies for the poor lighting in your room and throughout the hotel. We will take your comments in consideration as we make our rooms and public spaces more appealing.  We would like to invite you to give us a try again on your next trip to Orange County so we can have a chance to make your next stay more pleasant by providing you with the high standards of service which we are known for.

Summary Heading: Great place at a great rate
Summary: I needed a room for a night in between two days at a conference and searched for the lowest price in the area. I was so surprised to find such a nice hotel at such a great rate. I felt safe and it was clean. The breakfast was wonderful and the staff was friendly and attentive. The cleaning staff and front desk staff were very courteous, too.

Very clean and modern.  2 rooms- a family room w a flat screen tv, plenty of storage space, mini fridge, coffee maker, and microwave.  The back room had two comfy beds, large closet, safe, and the suite's bathroom was ajoined.  I was very happy staying here.  Next time, I'll bring my bathing suit so I can enjoy the lovely pool.

For a very reasonable priced hotel we would definitely recommend staying here and will tell family/friends too stay here when they visit.

Summary: Check in moved me when I was unsatisfied with the room. The room I moved to was spacious, clean and nicely decorated. I returned from an event after midnight, and the night clerk came upstairs and fixed the TV, when I reported that it  wasn't working.

Check in was quick and the staff was extremely friendly and helpful by providing us with information for the taxi cab companies in the area so we wouldn't have to drive to/from the concert. Manager Response: Dear MrsZazu,  Thank you very much for your kind words about our hotel. Summary: Despite the surroundings, it was a very nice hotel! There was easy access from the freeway. We chose the hotel because of it's location for the event we were attending and when we arrived we were a little taken aback by it's surroundings in an apparently less than prosperous couple of blocks. We walked into a crisp and clean lobby, cheerful greetings, and efficient check-in.   We took the elevator to our room and were surprised by how much space we had. There was a living area with a desk for working, a sofa, chair, and table area which faced the entertainment center with TV, microwave, and hidden refrigerator. The bedroom could be separated from the living area by a sliding door and was quite spacious on it's own. There was a second TV on the dresser next to the closet. The

Summary Heading: A solid 3.5/5 hotel that offers a good value for your dollar
Summary: After a recent two week stay, I'd say that this hotel deserves a solid 3.5 stars.  My overall stay was very pleasant.  I checked in late in the evening and was up in my room in short order.  The room did have a somewhat musty smell, but opening up the windows or turning on the AC solved that issue for me.  My first impression of the room was that it was very spacious and clean.  The bathroom is a nice size and again, very clean.  The updated decor is simple, but works to give it a slightly more upscale look.  I appreciated that there were plenty of outlets around to plug gadgets into and even two flat screen TVs.  I also appreciated that there was plenty of space to spread out and lay your stuff out.  During my stay, I did notice that, because of the design of the courtyard,

Summary: The hotel was very clean and there was lots of parking. We were in a queen suite and it was nice to have another room to watch TV instead of sitting on the bed. The breakfast was great, the chef cooks you eggs, hash browns, bacon or sausage. You can also make your own waffle and they had lots of drinks and pastries to choose from also. We will definitely be staying at this hotel again as my daughter starts UC Irvine in the fall and this hotel was only 13 mins away.

Summary Heading: Best Wester Plus, Lake Forest, Calif.
Summary: We were four people staying in a suite.  There was plenty of room.  The room was very clean.  Any requests were met immediately.  Good value.  Easy access to freeway and airport. Pool was very clean and enjoyable.  We were able to use computer in the lobby to print boarding passes and get driving directions to restaurants and and entertainment.

We look forward to being your warm, welcoming hosts again during your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Decent Stay, Friendly Staff, Altercation outside room
Summary: Booked this hotel last minute as we were seeing a concert at the Verizon Wireless Amphitheater nearby.  Hotel is in a decent area, easy on and off access to Fwy.  Staff at front desk were extremely friendly both during check-in and check-out.  The room was comfortable, not overly spacious, but they've remodeled them to be nice, with crown mouldings, etc.  A separate living room area with TV with a couch and chair, and then we had two queens in bedroom area.  Bathroom is very small with a shower and toilet only.  There is then a bowl sink that sits on dresser in front of the beds.  This is an awkward set up, but one that was "ok" for a one night stay.    There was a group of teens/young adults loitering by the elevators when we arrived back to the hotel after the concert.  Later,

Summary: Everything at this hotel exceeded my expectations! The staff was friendly and helpful and the breakfast was good, except they had turkey bacon instead of real bacon. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Summary: I was having a hard time finding a place in Southern Caliornia. The selection seemed minimal. Prices were high and the reviews were awful. My father's caregiver recommended the Best Western Plus because a friend worked there. The location was ideal. I called up and found out not only were rooms available but the price reasonable. I believe it had not been showing up on some sites because of limited availability. The room was great. It was a suite with two flat screen TVs. The furnishings were nice. The breakfast buffet was plentiful. And parking was indoors. A great place. I will be back.

We are glad to hear that we surpassed your expectations - as it is our goal to exceed the expectations of every one of our guests.  Please come and visit us soon. Our entire staff is ready to make your next trip to Orange County your best experience yet.

Summary: Clean, spacious, well kept, nice staff and good location make this a place of choice. BUT their internet sucks. Drops off all the time, slow, doesn't work in the rooms very well.  They need to fix this. We use Wi-Fi for our personal communications and are tired of constantly dealing with the problems at this hotel. If not for this problem we would stay there anytime and recommended it highly other than this one issue.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel,  Thank you very much for your words on your experience at our hotel. We do our best to provide all our guests with comfortable accommodations.   Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences that our Wi-Fi created for you. We are definitely addressing this issue by updating our equipment and increasing our bandwidth, which should have it corrected right away.  We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel's cleanliness, location and facilities. We would like to invite you to give us a try again on your next trip to Orange County so we can have a chance to impress you with the high standards of service which we are known for.

Summary: We could not have searched out a nicer or more accommodating hotel.  It was convenient to everything we wanted to see, quiet, staff was pleasant and extremely professional.  The hot breakfast was an added perk that I was not expecting.  The pool and jacuzzi were well maintained.
Manager Response: Dear  Donna,  We truly appreciate your nice compliments. Our staff and management work hard every day to make our guests feel special when they stay with us. Our commitment is to provide each and every guest with our own brand of warm, positive service.   It's a pleasure to see that you were able to enjoy our accommodations and amenities. Please come back and visit us again soon. It will be our pleasure to make your next trip to Lake Forest, CA a memorable one.

Summary: I was very impressed with the "lay-out" and architecture of the hotel. Though I stayed (I believe) in a standard room, I saw a sort of "Town House" type room called a "tower room" within the same hotel.  Absolutely beautiful, with a spiral staircase leading to a bedroom in the already spacious suite.   I will probably return to this Best Western Plus "\Spectrum" Hotel as soon as funds provide, just to stay in this Tower Room. There is much to do and see in the Lake Forest area (a rather well kept secret).. But now, I KNOW!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words. Our staff and management take pride in knowing that we were able to make your Orange County vacation a pleasant experience. Our commitment is to provide each and every guest with our own brand of warm, positive service.   We are happy that you enjoyed our hotel's architecture as well as our facilities and amenities. Please come back and visit us again soon. We will be sure to have one of our Tower Suites available for you.  It will be our pleasure to make your next trip to Lake Forest, CA a memorable one.

Summary: Location to rest of Family was reason I chose this Hotel. Also I am a Best Western reward member. Accommodation's were clean but outdated.  The TV's were not user friendly. Took too long to turn on and too long to change channels. Other than that, we had no other issues with this Hotel. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Walter,  Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay at our hotel. It is through your comments and suggestions that we can know how well we are living up to our standards. We are glad to hear that you found value and convenience in the facilities and amenities we provide. Our staff and management are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with helpful and courteous service.   We apologize for the difficulties you experienced in operating our TVs. We will do our best to update them and ensure that they are easy to operate.  Please come visit us again soon. We will be delighted to be your gracious hosts again on your next trip to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: Good hotel for the price, skip the breakfast.
Summary: Hotel was good for the price.  Large room with a living room that had a fridge & microwave and extra TV so that kid could watch in one room and wife could nap in the other.  Pool & spa were fine.  Skip breakfast - food was mediocre and they only had one staff who was cooking and serving the meat & eggs, and cleaning, and stocking!  We have been to many Best Westerns and other hotels that do this style breakfast, and everything is self-serve.  If they are so concerned about manning the food, they should have adequate staffing and not make the hotel guests wait in long lines for mediocre food.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your opinion about your stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our clean rooms and friendly service. Our goal is to provide clean, comfortable accommodations for a great value to all our guests.  Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you encountered at our complimentary breakfast. We work constantly to improve the quality of our product and services, and we will take your suggestions to ensure that our breakfast service is always excellent.   We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Orange County. It will be our pleasure to be at your service again and to ensure that your next stay with us is more enjoyable than the last.

Summary: This is a hidden gem of a hotel.  We stayed a couple of months ago with our soccer team and enjoyed the hotel so much we came back for a mini vacation.  Hotel is right off the freeway in a business area and is very quiet.  The grounds and rooms are clean and inviting.  We had a double queen suite and the room was large and comfortable for a family of 4.  If you use the pull out sofa it would still be comfortable for 2 more travelers or kids.  Breakfast area was nice.  it had hot foods and pastries.
Manager Response: Dear EToldman,  Thank you very much for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We are glad to hear that we surpassed your expectations and that you chose us again on your return trip. Our goal is to exceed the expectations of every one of our guests.  Please come and visit us soon either with your soccer team or on a relaxing vacation in Orange County. Our entire staff is ready to be your warm and gracious hosts.

Summary Heading: Irvine Spectrum hotel near  Laguana Beach
Summary: This hotel is decent priced hotel only few miles from Laguna Beach. I wanted to come here because I wanted to visit our great hockey players restaurant Teemu Selanne Steak house. Hotel has great suites with separate living and bedroom. The decor is pretty new and provides good working environment along with good sleep quality. Breakfast is excellent, there is a chef who makes omelette, hash browns, bacon etc AND THAT IS INCLUDED IN THE HOTEL ROOM PRICE. The staff is very helpful, they direct You in where You want to go and they keep smiling to Your all requests.
Manager Response: Dear Matti,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your opinion about your stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious suites, complimentary breakfast and friendly service. We work constantly to improve the quality of our product and services, and to ensure that every experience with us is warm and enjoyable.  We hope that you enjoyed your trip to Laguna Beach and that you had great fun at Selanne Steak Tavern. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum welcomes business travelers and family vacationers
Summary: Suite was spacious. I used the desk to do some writing and such. Living room area sofa was OK, not the most comfortable when just lounging and watching TV. The TV had some problems with changing channels. But everything on was on the World Cup. Kitchenette counter with sink, microwave, and small refrigerator was a nice. We would have used it if we stayed longer. Separate bedroom had a weird layout with spa tub in the bedroom. The king bed was comfortable king bed. The shower door didn't seal right so the water leaked onto the floor, but it was spacious.  Complimentary continental breakfast is served from 6am to 9am in the Breakfast Room by the pool. Fresh made-to-order eggs your way, turkey bacon or sausage, and hash browns from the grill. I would have liked pork bacon and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback on your recent experience at Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum. Summary Heading: Great hotel, friendly staff, good breakfast
Summary: My wife and I and two kids (8 and 6 months) stayed here for a week on vacation and enjoyed it.  Clean, quiet room, good breakfast and very friendly employees.  We saw some less than stellar reviews on TripAdvisor but those definitely do not reflect our experience.  One minor note that is of no fault of the hotel - if you're coming from I-5, the exit from the main road to the road the hotel is on is a little tricky and comes up on you quickly, as info.

Summary: The employees do not care about guests. Better service can be had from talking to a brick wall. The rooms are unorganized and missing items. Motel style setup for an outrageous price. Extremely poor hotel design forces you to climb 4 floors of stairs if you have a room on the highest floor, or try to find the poorly labeled ONLY (1) elevator in this "hotel".  As another reviewer stated: They force you to wonder around like "lost sheep looking for places".

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, perfect location, Can't beat the delux Breakfast
Summary: Hi, we had booked into this Hotel for the first four days of our 10 day trip. After spending a few days there, enjoying it's ammenities and its close Proximity to the Pacific Coast Highway that took us to Laguna beach, Newport beach, Huntington beach and Santa Monica beach, we decided to extend our stay at this Hotel. It had very easy access to Freeway to Disney, 30km away and Knots Berry farm. The price was fantastic compared to the Hotels closer to Disney. I have stayed in any Hotels but first time we got to experience a hotel room with a loft that was accessed up a spiral staircase. Living room with Sofa bed, Loft and bedroom with super comfortable King size beds adorned with nice thick quilts. Each room having their own flat screen TV was a real treat with large family.

Summary Heading: An reasonable hotel located handy for business in Irvine, CA.
Summary: Stayed here one night when on business in Irvine as this was close to where I had to attend my meetings.  My room was on the 4th floor and was nice and big, like a suite.  It was cleanand comfortable but not 'stnd-out' in any way... Just Average.  It had a wash basin in the bedroom on the dresser next to the TV!  Which was a bit odd and although a bit different I think I would prefer to have the sink in the bathroom!!  Was just a tad odd.  Bed was comfortable and shower etc. was all fine.  Staff at check-in and check-out were very good and one of the maintenance men (Fernando I think his name was) kindly asked me as I left whether I needed a hand with my bags as I was a bit loaded down... A nice gesture.  Car parking was a bit tight as 90% of the parking was under a covered area

Summary: Unforseen circumstances prompted a rather lengthy stay.  It was a very pleasant surprise to come upon this hotel.  While it's not in a touristy area, its definitely close enough for those traveling with their own vehicle to get to some of the major attractions like Disneyland and the beaches.  The rooms - and I do mean that each room is actually a suite including a bedrooom area and a living room/ work area that can be closed off from the bedroom- are spacious and afford privacy if you happen to be traveling with kids, or just need some separate space away from a cranky spouse.  There are 2 tv's, one in the bedtroom area and one in the living area, which is also a bonus, and it was wonderful to not have to sit on the bed just to watch some tv!  Internet service is also included,

Summary Heading: Do Not Leave Valuables in Your Room
Summary: My husband left his hearing aides on the night stand.  When we returned to the room, the hearing aides were gone but the room was cleaned.  The hotel staff did not find the hearing aides.  Can't know why someone would steal hearing aides.  They acted like he lost them elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback.  Your concerns are very important to us.  Please accept our apologies for not being able to locate your hearing aid.  We actively conducted an inhouse search but we were unable to locate your item.  Once again we are very sorry for your loss.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Will change your rate on you!!!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel, then we wanted to stay again and you upped your rate on us. We went on the internet and get a current price to stay a 3rd time, and after a price was quotes and I went to book the room, you changed the price on me. No one offered to help (I called the 800 number and called the hotel direct (no one can speech English)), so after years of using the Best Western, if this is the kind of service we are to expect, we will go elsewise.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback to us.  Your feedback helps us in improving and making changes as necessary.  The issues you've mentioned are being addressed as to prevent events like this from re-occuring.  We are diligently working at providing the best in service and product to all our guests.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: The hotel is my favorite whenever I go to Irvine for business. Very clean and everything is new. I wish they had a friendly guy making the breakfast eggs and also wish they replace the toilet paper holders.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  We will definitely look into the issue  s you've mentioned.  We are working diligently to provide you with the best in product and service. Please contact us for your next reservation.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Upon entering the room I noticed many upgrades including new furniture, new drapes and lamps which looked great BUT things fell apart quickly after.  Stains on the couch, hair inside the sheets, some really gross stains on the stool kept(don't want to know what it was).    With some tender loving care this property could live up to the expectations in its PLUS name but management needs to do some investigation into their housekeeping team.  These rooms should not be sold.  The front desk agent was kind enough to let me cancel my reservation and take my business to another location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.   Please accept our apologies for the issues encountered.  We will address the issues with housekeeping as to prevent this from happening.  Thank you once again for your feedback.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Seriously in the middle of check in and I know this place sucks!
Summary: So I made a reservation asked if I could check I'm early , wasn't guaranteed but if they had room they would accommodate me. Long story short they can't check me in early because English is not the language used in here and I can't cancel because it's too late good thing I drove 7 hrs so I could sleep in my car !!!! So I will write another review after I'm forced to serve my sentence here!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to provide us with your feedback.  We apologize for the inconvenience at check in.  We do our best in providing ready rooms to our guests as soon as possible.  We will see what actualy happened and we will make corrections as needed.  Once again please accept our apology.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: the hotels around Disneyland have become too pricey so we searched for ones a little further out and found this one about 20-30min from Anaheim.  the price was so good (less than $85) we spent 5 nights.  we had no problems whatsover.  the staff was great.  the hot breakfast was good.  every room has a separate living room and there's a flat big screen tv in each room.  rooms were clean.  the only thing is the pool wasn't heated but in sunny socal that isn't a big deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as your destination hotel while in the Disneyland area.  We are delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable vacation.  Our property is an All-Suites property so that means all of our rooms consist of the bedroom and living area.  Each room has Its own big/flat screen TV and the room includes hot breakfast every morning of your visit.  Thank you for visiting and for providing your feedback.  Hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Best Western in Lake Forest has become my new home.  The staff  are great!  The breakfast is good, but the quality of service that the people give is the best.  Being able to enjoy a good, clean location for my wife and kids is the memorable.  I plan to come back again when I'm on vacation again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to provide us with your feedback.  We are delighted to hear that your vacation with us was to your satisfaction.  Please let us know when you are coming back so that we may assist you with your room reservations.  Look forward to your next visit.  Our Greetings to you and your family.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Hotel and staff were very accomodating. Room was excellent, and I enjoyed my stay. Although it was across the street from the Irvine Spectrum, it was easily accessable, and had a parking garage. It is pretty compact, but very clean inside and outside. No street noise, and all amenities were in working order. I found the price to be resonable to in relation to other Best Westerns in Orange County
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your feedback and leting us know how we did. I am glad we were able to meet your expectations in all areas.  We do our best in providing excellent customer service and a quality product.  Please let us know when you are ready to come back so that we may assist you with making reservations.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Large rooms but poorly lit. One day of our stay our room was not cleaned. Free cooked to order breakfast, but during weekend cook was backed up with all orders being placed. Needed more help. Had a group of 3 rooms in our party and at breakfast the first day one of our group found a thin, curly piece of wire in the waffle (the hotel did comp them one nights stay).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback in regards to your recent visit.  Please accept our apologies for the issues you encountered.  We are at this time taking care of the issues    so as to make our guests experience a positive one.  Once again please accept our apology.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: My wife and I booked this hotel for two nights due to a surgical procedure I was going to have.  The first night of the stay, other people at the hotel were "partying" till after 3:00 am.  The next day the manager kindly moved us to another room away from the noise for which we most thankful.   However, after unpacking in the new room, we found out the ac/heater/fan unit did not work at all.  After speaking again to the desk, I was told me there were no other rooms available and that she would send a repair man.  No repair man showed up.  Thankfully it was a cool Southern California day, but the noise of the freeway and odors were a bother.  On the morning of the second day I expressed my disappointment to the clerk and she assured me that the manager would call me.  There has
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We regret to hear that your stay with us was not as pleasant as you would have liked.  I apologize for the issues with the air conditioner.  We are geting the issue fixed. I hope you will give us the oportunity to make it up to you.  If you have any questions please call the property and ask for Juan Carlos.    Once again, please accept our apologies.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez General Manager

Summary Heading: best western is not the best
Summary: Bad for the value. Given smoking room instead of non-smoking. Lying staff. Problems solved but should not appear in this category. The receptionist does not know they have a free PC + printer and tells: ""we do not have a printer here" to a request to print a single page.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and for your valuable feedback.  I apologize for the inconvenience upon check in, although im glad you were able to finally get into the nonsmoking room you requested.  Our printer in the business center was not working for a few days but its now working and our guests are able to print.  I will train the front desk in alternatives if printer happens to go down.   Thank you for your feedback and once again please accept our apology.    Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: The location of this hotel is convenient with close proximity to the freeway but the rooms are still quite quiet. They are spacious and clean with comfortable beds.  The best part of this hotel was the breakfast -the continental breakfast it was hot and freshly cooked best breakfast ever at a Best Western.  Would definitely stay at this hotel again if I was in the area
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback on your recent visit.  We are delighted to hear your stay was an enjoyable one.  We strive in providing the best in service and product.  Call us when you are ready to book your next visit.    Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Great value, close to highway, clean
Summary: A comfortable room for 4 adults. Living room is separated by a sliding door (didn't move smoothly tough, but we left it open). 2 televisions in the unit.  The beds were comfortable, but you could feel all the springs in the pull out couch. Close to highway and parking is free.   The made to order breakfast was great (2 eggs any style + meat choice).   Staff (front desk and chef/server) was friendly and efficient. Got extra towels with no hassle at all. Work station available with working printer as well.   Great value, would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank for your valuable feedback.  We are glad the you enjoyed your visit and that we were able to meet your expectations.  Please note we will look into the issues you mentioned so that we may get them fixed.  Please contact us for your next reservation.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: I stayed at this Best Western PLUS on a whim one evening, needless to say i was surprised.   The room was lovely. bed was comfortable and everything worked perfect.  nice and spacious.   Breakfast line was a little ridiculous, but after a short wait got what i wanted.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to provide your feedback.  We appreciate you leting us know how we are doing.  We are delighted to hear that we met your expectations during your recent visit.  We strive to give our best in product and service.  Please let us know how we may assist you in your future travel plans.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Nice to have covered parking. The full service breakfast with grill cook and server was a pleasant surprise.  It was convenient to the 405 and I-5 without the noise of a freeway.  Having a McDonalds withing walking distance was great.  A short drive to  Albertsons was a happy benefit also. It was a quiet, comfortable place to stay.  My only complaint was the unpleasant sulfer odor from the sink when I ran water there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to provide us with your feedback.  We are delighted to hear your visit was a pleasant one.  We do our best to provide you with excellent service and superior quality in our product.  Your opinions and suggestions are valuable to us in helping us improve our services.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Very good value in Orange County
Summary: I just finished a 4 day stay in Orange County, and had a good stay at the Best Western Plus in Irvine.  Very convenient to access off the 405/5 freeways.  It is an older hotel, but well kept up with a little wear and tear here and there.  However, it was clean and well staffed, and the amenities for the price are very good.  You receive a full breakfast served up as you like it from a chef (eggs/breakfast meats are on the menu) plus the usual continental fare.  It was too cold for the pool, but the hot tub was available and kept clean and at a very good temperature.  Parking was adequate, with much of it under cover.  The neighborhood is business park quiet, with one other hotel and a restaurant immediately adjacent.   The room I had included a living area with an extra TV, and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to provide to us your valued feedback.  We are delighted to hear that your stay was enjoyable and that we were able to accomodate your needs.  Please call us for your next reservation.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: This hotel offers a suite (bedroom and spacious living room) with amenities (coffee, tea, iron, etc), plus a swimming pool and free hot breakfast (cooked to order), at a rate far below some nearby hotels. I find the suite clean. Check-in services are efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and feedback.  We are delighted to hear that we've met your needs and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Please let us know if we can be of further assistance to you in your future travels.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: BIG rooms (in 2 Br Suite) - Deep tub. Older fixtures. Cheap, uncomfortable couch & chair. Miserable Wi Fi service. But, the whole facility was BIG and nicely maintained. Superb pool and spa. FREE breakfast items cooked to order....a nice change from the countertop continental style cardboard.....
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.  We value our guests comments and we address the issues if any that are brought to our attention.  We are glad that you enjoyed our property while visiting us and we are addressing the issues you've mentioned.  Thank you once again and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: My family and I really enjoy our 3 day stay at this Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum Hotel.  It was conveniently close to Knotts Berry Farm and to Laguna Beach and Dana Point Beach and to Westminster, CA..  The breakfast cook-to-order was excellent, but 2 short order cooks would speed up the process much better.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to provide feedback of your recent visit.  We are delighted to hear we were able to meet your needs.  We do our best in providing you with quality in service and product.  Please call us for booking your next visit.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Great Place and Special Thank You !
Summary: A special thank you to Gabriela ,working at the front desk.The key component for me to return to this hotel is the staff. It all gave me very good impression to return to this hotel and I believe their level of service should be recognized. The amenities here are also great.  They have an outdoor swimming pool and Jacuzzi.  I got lucky with the weather here because even it is only Feb., the temperature was perfect.  The pool is heated as well, but didn't jump in, just sat in the Jacuzzi. The room was very spacious and clean.  The King bed was amazing.  Firm but not hard.  Lots and lots of soft pillows.  I slept like a baby. The next morning there was a complimentary breakfast buffet   There was a combination of hot and cold foods.    Coffee was good, and with any buffet, you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know of your recent visit at our location.  We are delighted in hearing you had a great stay and that we met your expectations.  Please let us know of your next visit in town so that we may reserve a room for you.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff and spacious lovely room
Summary: Gabriela at the front desk was wonderful to us.  Rooms have recently been remodeled and are spacious.  Nice bed and huge bathroom.  2 TV's in the room, Complimentary breakfast was pretty good.  Price was outstanding compared to what you'd get for the  same price anywhere else in the area.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to respond and provide your feeback.  We are delighted to know that we met your expectations.  We do our best in bringing you quality in service and product.  Thank you for your comments.  Please call us for your next visit.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: The breakfasts were great,  the size of the rooms are good, decor  was a little tired,  stains on the the furniture.  Beds were okay the sheets a little hard and stiff.  Very nice staff.  Close to food, shopping and the freeways.  The price for the rooms were very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your repsonse and feeback on your recent visit.  We are glad that we were able to meet your needs.  I would like to inform you that we are looking over the issues you pointed out.  We look forward to your next visit.  Call us for your next reservation.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Extremely dissatisfied with management and service.  Room did not get serviced during our stay. Had to go to front desk and pick-up replacement towels.  Was considering a return to this hotel however thinking otherwise after our experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback on your recent stay.  We apologize the service was not to your satisfaction.  We asure you we are addressing the issues to make our guests experience a positive and enjoyable one.  Thank you once again and our apologies.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: The rooms are large,really tastefully decorated and completely unexpected!  Large bathtub and great water pressure.  Great neighborhood with easy access to the freeways, shopping and places to eat.  Try it -- you will love it!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback.  We are glad your stay was a pleasant one.  We do our best in making sure all our guests have a pleasant stay.  Thank you once again.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: This was hands down the worst experience I've ever had at a chain hotel (granted this is most likely a purchased franchise), well at any hotel to be honest. I could go in to the entire experience but who has the time to read that? In a nutshell: The entire staff was horribly rude and lacked all aspects of hospitality. You make think this is minimal but imagine trying to pay your bill and you're treated as an escaped patient with the plague by a raggedy woman with pink hair and a nasty attitude (Gabriella). From a holistic view, this hotel literally offers nothing other than location when compared to others and could care less about anyone checking in, they just want you to get in and get the hell out. I would never stay here again nor would I ever recommend this specific
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay.  I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced.  We are looking into the issues you've brought to our attention.  Our goal is to make every guests experience a delightfull one.  I regret to hear your stay wasn't to your satisfaction.  Management is addressing the issues you've mentioned.  Once again please accept our apologies.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: The hotel was perfect except for the sofa bed which needs to be replaced. The beds slept really good, the rooms were really clean and smelled fresh, the breakfast was good, the service was great. I would stay here again and recommend it to others. The area is quiet and off the main road which I really like.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feeback on your recent visit.  We are glad that you enjoyed it.  We will look into the issue of the sofabed and will get it fixed.  Thank you for leting us know how we are doing.  See you next time.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: I have stayed a few times now since summer 2013. Great value, very clean, excellent staff, good breakfast. All rooms are suites, completely renovated, clean spacious & comfortable. Quiet location, covered parking nice bed, linens & towels.  Very convenient to clients in Irvine & Orange County.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent visit.  We are extremely delighted that you had an outstanding visit with us.  We strive in providing the best in service and product and we are glad we were able to do that for you.  Please let us know when you will be visiting again so that we may reserve your suite.  Sincerely, GM

Summary: Great value for the money.  Room was spotless, beds very comfortable.  Building a little tired, Lobby was nice and comfortable,  breakfast wonderful,  and furniture in living room a bit shabby.  Hotel was VERY quiet and parking was convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to respond to our survey.  Your feedback is very valuable to us. We are happy you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Stayed 1/9/14-1/13/14.  We were pleasantly surprised when we arrived.  The room was spacious and clean.  The furnishing were nice and the beds were very comfortable.  The staff was friendly and accommodating.  The microwave did not work and I called the desk clerk who had it fixed within 10 minutes.  The hot made to order breakfast was great.  The only issue was getting the room replenished with coffee, cups and toilet paper.  Late one night after returning to our room we discovered that there was less than 1/2 roll of toilet paper, no cups or coffee.  Had requested more coffee & cups that morning.  We called the front desk and they sent up the supplies within minutes.  Would have rated a 5 if not for this.
Manager Response: Thank your for taking time to give us your feedback on your recent visit.  We are glad your stay was enjoyable and to your satisfaction.   Hope we see you soon.  Please call us for your next reservation.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: The room was very spacious, two TVs.  Temp control was good.  I had a private balcony.  Very quiet except for some upstairs traffic and some individuals yelling in the common areas a couple of times on Saturday night. But very quiet overall.  There was an odor in the room when I entered each time in the night, the source I could not pinpoint.  But it dissipated with some airing out and did not linger in my clothes when I left.   Wasn't worth complaining about. Room was non smoking.  I was happy with my choice.  I loved the made to order breakfast in the morning dining area.  Food order must be consumed in the dining room per health code. Staff very friendly, helpful.  Good value for that area for me.
Manager Response: Please accept our apology for the issues that arose because of the elevator.  The elevator issues have been addressed by licensed technician and improvements have been made.  This is not a common problem but one that is addressed immediately when it arises.  General Manager empathizes   with your conerns and would like to extend his apologies for any misunderstanding.  Please be assured we have the utmost concern for the well being and safety of our guests.  The staff issues are being addressed to provide our guests with  top quality guest services.  Thank you for your feedback and once again we apologize for your inconvenience and conerns.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez General Manager

Summary Heading: Horriable stay will not go back !
Summary: I stayed here on 1/7-9. This was the most horrible stay I have been in with lack of staff. But the Suites where amazing don’t get me wrong just the staff in the lobby was not friendly to me. After arriving early to start are vacation, I went to check in with one of their front desk girl was very rude her name tag was not showing. she was wearing a jacket that covered her name and the fact that she didn’t greet me at check in she was a bit demanding in away. She wanted to charge me for my 2 teen girls and my 4 yr old girl in which I read their policy with no extra cost. Finally received my keys and the lady had lightened up after awhile. Any was as we where trying to wait for their elevators, their elevators had closed and with seconds from crushing my daughter and guest hands
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the issues that arose while visiting our property.  Improvements to the elevator has been made by a licensed technician.  These are unforseen problems that arise and when they happen we address them immediately.   The General Manager apologizes and empathizes with your concerns.  We value our guests and their families and we place their safety and well being as our priority.  Staff issues are being addressed to bring the best guest service to our visitors.  Thank you for your feedback and once again we apologize for your inconvenience.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez General Manager

Summary: Great Stay, Staff very helpful. Room was large and very clean. Bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was cooked to order. Hotel was very convient to my location of work . Internet was a little slow but very nice business center for option.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback.  We appreciate you leting us know how we are doing.  It is our goal to meet all our guests expectations and we are glad we got the opportunity to meet yours.  Thank you for all your comments.

Summary: This was an excellent hotel.  Several families stayed here during a wedding and we were pleased.  The rooms were very clean and the staff was friendly.  This was nicer than some of the more expensive ones we stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback.  We are delighted to hear your stay was enjoyable and that everything was to your satisfaction.  We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, GM

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay and love the area
Summary: We stayed from December 20-25. Our stay was nothing but top notch! Our room was awesome. We didn't need maid service everyday. Our choice. The room was quiet.....we had room 305 right by elevator. Never heard any clamoring. The food was very good compared to Dennys.  Sure it gets busy and the cook falls behind.....no big deal. He made our food to order. Management was very professional.  They have only been operating under new name for a couple months. Allow them time to iron out the wrinkles. I will stay again! Thanks guys for the awesome stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feeback on your recent visit to our property.  We are glad your stay was pleasant and enjoyable.  Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance and call us for your next reservation.  Sincerely, GM

Summary Heading: Good from far, far from good
Summary: The hotel has a great exterior visual appeal and the lobby area is well designed and maintained. Front desk agent was a pleasure as well. This all led me to believe my stay would be very pleasant. Sadly I was disappointed. My room stunk like wet towels and cleaning chemicals The sofa was absolutely filthy, with stains and cigarette burns. The two TVs were a nice touch except the channels were very blurry and no premium cable options (could at least do HD). Worst part of the stay was the lack of sound proofing in the rooms. I knew when my neighbors entered the room, took showers, and used their restroom. Could even hear their TV at times. Breakfast was very well done with a live station for eggs, bacon, hash browns, and the pool looked clean. WiFi was hit or miss most of the
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and feeback of your recent stay.  We apologize for the inconvenience you mentioned.  We are addressing the issues and will work on fixing those concerns immediately.  Thank you once again for bringing it to our attention.  Sincerely, GM

Summary: We are glad we have chosen  BW Irvine Spectrum for our three nights' stay right before New Year.  We picked a hotel between LA and San Diego so we could travel to SeaWorld on one day and visit LA on another.   One reason we chose this hotel because it is about the same price as other one room hotel yet it's actually two small rooms.  One room houses our bed while the kids stay in the other room on the sofa bed.  Each room has a 40" flat screen TV so the kids can have their own room.  They still have to go past our room to go to the rest room but i like it this way, it's much better than 4 people stuck in the same room.  The hotel is much better than your average two story motel in terms of hotel amenities, appearance and comfort.  It's a multi-story building and you park your
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and for  providing feedback of your recent visit.  We are very happy that everything was to your liking and satisfaction.  We work diligently to bring you the best in product and service and to make every guest's visit comfortable and enjoyable.  Thank you for all your compliments it is much appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit, please call us so that we may book your next reservation.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez General Manager

Summary: Hotel staffs are good to help, but room is not as good as expected to a suite. the carpet and washroom need to be rennovated. Breakfast is good enough for family stay. The location is easy to find by freeway I-5.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us.   We are glad you enjoyed your visit and that we were able to provide you what you needed.  We look forward to your next visit soon.  Sincerely, GM

Summary: Our family usually selects Best Western hotels for cleanliness and good service. This one was terrible.  The elevator closes too soon and almost crushed me, the sofabed was torn in our room, we could hear our neighbor using the bathroom, there was a smell, the televsision picuture was very bad, and to top it all off, the breakfast was lousy. Only one ice machine was operational, not enough staff to deliver extra towels so we had to go get them at the front desk. Even the guy at the front desk admitted their facility was subpar. The photos on the website must have been of another place.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback to us of your recent visit to our property.  We apologize for the inconvenience you experience due to the issues you mentioned in your response.  We assure you the issues are being addressed and proper measures are being taken to make corrections.    Sincerely, GM

Summary: Made reservations for family. On December 31, 2013 breakfast eggs were served ice cold.  Granted the breakfast area was busy, but please, make the eggs hot!  Then after celebrating New Years, we get back to hotel and NONE OF THE ROOMS HAD MAID SERVICE during the day.  I had better service when the hotel was called "Irvine Suites".  This is not up to Best Western standards, by a long shot.  Will have to see what the manager is willing to do.  I see Courtyard by Marriott or the Holiday Inn Express in my future, like tonight.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to provide feedback to us of your recent  visit.  We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  We will be addressing the departments accordingly to remedy and fix your concerns.  Once again please accept our apology.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez -General Manager-

Summary: This location was perfect for us to visit family for our Christmas Vacation. This location had the most awsome breakfast we have ever had at any hotel they we have stayed at in our travels accross the USA. The staff was pleasent and the rooms were very nice with a seperate sitting room. The rooms were clean and house keeping were ready to help out with our additional requests.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent visit.   Sounds like it was a great experience and we are glad it was so.   We always do our best in providing excellent services so that visitors have an enjoyableand pleasant stay.  Thank you once again.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez -General Manager-

Summary: We stayed here while visiting friends and family in California for the holidays.  Very convenient to freeways, shopping, and food.  Helpful staff, clean rooms, comfortable beds and great breakfast.  Liked the under ground parking...security walked me to the door after parking the car....nice touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and your feedback of your recent visit.  Thank you for visiting our property and we are delighted to hear your stay was a pleasant and enjoyable experience.  Please let us know of your next visit so that we may accomodate your reservation.  Sincerely, Juan Carlos Gonzalez (GM)

Summary: This hotel is located near great shopping, good restaurants, far enough away from the tacky tourist shops, close enough to Disneyland, Knott's Berry farm, the beach, LEGOLAND  and shopping. It was easy to get on the freeway!  The staff is very friendly and ready to help at any moment. They are full of useful information and willing to help in any way they can.  I recommend this place if you wan to stay in a quiet and friendly location.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback.  We are glad you enjoyed your recent visit with Best Western Plus Irvine Spectrum.  Thank you for the opportunity of serving you with your lodging needs.  Please let us know when you plan your next visit to our location.  Sincerely, GM

Summary: The five stars doesn't mean its another Broadmoor, but for its class it rates the five.  Price was excellent.  Our stay was five nights, departing Christmas Day.  Our 4th floor rooms were spacious and clean.  The living area contained a large 16x9 aspect ratio TV, comfortable couch and matching easy chair, an office desk, ample storage drawers, a fridge and microwave.  The totally separate bedroom and bath had a similar TV and a comfortable king size foam mattress.  Again, plenty of storage for an extended stay.  Nice bath, good towels, and an adjustable shower head that actually worked.    A big plus in my mind was the lighting.  The minute we turned on the lights I thought they were 100 watt incandescents.  I am really put off by dark rooms, poorly lit by 13 watt cfls that
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent visit to our property.  It was a pleasure having you visit during the holidays.  We are glad your stay was an enjoyable one.  Please call us so that we may book your next visit.    Sincerely, GM

Summary: This hotel was conveniently located close to the freeway and getting on and off was easy. There are several good chain restaurants very close to the hotel and they offer a great range in both price and quality.  This is an excellent location if you want to be near downtown Seattle but want to avoid costly hotel parking and downtown hotel prices.
Manager Response: We always appreciate any feedback from our guests.  We are glad you enjoyed your recent visit with us.  We look forward to your next visit.  Once again, "Thank You", for your valuable feedback.  Sincerely, GM

Summary: We highly recommend this Best Western in Lake Forest, Ca.  The staff is courteous, the location is central to all in Orange County.  We stayed in a suite, nicely appointed.  Breakfast was included in the price and cooked to order.  We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to give us your valued feedback.  We are glad to hear your stay was an enjoyable one.  Please let us know when you will be back so that we may make reservations for you.    Sincerely, GM
